00511 // Wraps up check for AP-s get from a different soldier for in a vehicle...
00512 INT8 GetUIApsToDisplay( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00513 {
00514       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle;
00515 
00516       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DRIVER )
00517       {
00518             pVehicle = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( pSoldier->iVehicleId );
00519 
00520             if ( pVehicle != NULL )
00521             {
00522                   return( pVehicle->bActionPoints );
00523             }
00524             else
00525             {
00526                   return( 0 );
00527             }
00528       }
00529       else
00530       {
00531             return ( pSoldier->bActionPoints );
00532       }
00533 }
00534 
00535 void CheckForDisabledForGiveItem( )
00536 {
00537       INT16             sDist;
00538       INT16             sDistVisible;
00539       INT16             sDestGridNo;
00540       INT8              bDestLevel;
00541       INT32             cnt;
00542       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00543       UINT8             ubSrcSoldier;
00544 
00545       Assert( gpSMCurrentMerc != NULL);
00546 
00547       if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
00548       {
00549             gfSMDisableForItems = !CanMercInteractWithSelectedShopkeeper( gpSMCurrentMerc );
00550             return;
00551       }
00552 
00553       // Default to true
00554       gfSMDisableForItems = TRUE;
00555 
00556       // ATE: Is the current merc unconscious.....
00557       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife < OKLIFE && gpItemPointer != NULL )
00558       {
00559             // Go through each merc and see if there is one closeby....
00560             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00561             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00562             {     
00563                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->bInSector && IsMercOnCurrentSquad( pSoldier ) )
00564                   {
00565                         sDist = PythSpacesAway( gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo );
00566 
00567                         sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo, gpSMCurrentMerc->bLevel, gpSMCurrentMerc );
00568 
00569                         // Check LOS....
00570                         if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo,  gpSMCurrentMerc->bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
00571                         {
00572                               if ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_NOTOKLIFE )
00573                               {
00574                                     gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00575                                     break;      // found one, no need to keep looking
00576                               }
00577                         }
00578                   }
00579             }
00580       }
00581       else
00582       {
00583             ubSrcSoldier = (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier;
00584 
00585             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
00586             {
00587                   ubSrcSoldier = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID;
00588             }
00589 
00590             // OK buddy, check our currently selected merc and disable/enable if not close enough...
00591             if ( ubSrcSoldier != NOBODY )
00592             {
00593                   if ( gusSMCurrentMerc != ubSrcSoldier )
00594                   {
00595                         sDestGridNo = MercPtrs[ gusSMCurrentMerc ]->sGridNo;
00596                         bDestLevel  = MercPtrs[ gusSMCurrentMerc ]->bLevel;
00597 
00598                         // Get distance....
00599                         sDist = PythSpacesAway( MercPtrs[ ubSrcSoldier ]->sGridNo, sDestGridNo );
00600 
00601                         // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
00602                         sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( MercPtrs[ ubSrcSoldier ], DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sDestGridNo, bDestLevel, MercPtrs[ ubSrcSoldier ] );
00603 
00604                         // Check LOS....
00605                         if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( MercPtrs[ ubSrcSoldier ], sDestGridNo,  bDestLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE )  )
00606                         {
00607                               // UNCONSCIOUS GUYS ONLY 1 tile AWAY
00608                               if ( MercPtrs[ gusSMCurrentMerc ]->bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS )
00609                               {
00610                                     if ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_NOTOKLIFE )
00611                                     {
00612                                           gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00613                                     }
00614                               }
00615                               else if ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_OKLIFE )
00616                               {
00617                                     gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00618                               }
00619                         }
00620                   }
00621                   else
00622                   {
00623                         gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00624                   }
00625             }
00626             else
00627             {
00628                   gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00629             }
00630       }
00631 }
00632 
00633 void SetSMPanelCurrentMerc( UINT8 ubNewID )
00634 {
00635       gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = NOBODY;
00636 
00637       gusSMCurrentMerc = ubNewID;
00638 
00639       gpSMCurrentMerc = MercPtrs[ ubNewID ];
00640 
00641       // Set to current guy's interface level
00642       //if ( gsInterfaceLevel != gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel )
00643       //{
00644       //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00645       //    ErasePath(FALSE);
00646       //    gsInterfaceLevel = gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel;
00647       //}
00648 
00649       // Disable all faces
00650       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
00651 
00652       // Turn off compat ammo....
00653       if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00654       {
00655             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, (INT8)HANDPOS, FALSE );
00656             gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
00657       }
00658       else
00659       {
00660             // Turn it all false first....
00661             InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, FALSE );
00662             InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, TRUE );
00663       }
00664 
00665       // Remove item desc panel if one up....
00666       if ( gfInItemDescBox )
00667       {
00668             DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
00669       }
00670 
00671       if ( gfInItemPickupMenu )
00672       {
00673             gfSMDisableForItems = TRUE;
00674       }
00675       else
00676       {
00677             if ( ( gpItemPointer != NULL || guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE || gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife < OKLIFE ) )
00678             {
00679                   CheckForDisabledForGiveItem( );
00680             }
00681             else
00682             {
00683                   gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
00684             }
00685       }
00686 
00687       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
00688       {
00689             ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE );
00690       }
00691 
00692 
00693       DisableInvRegions( gfSMDisableForItems );
00694 
00695       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00696 
00697       gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
00698 
00699       UpdateSMPanel( );
00700 
00701 }
00702 
00703 
00704 void UpdateForContOverPortrait( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fOn )
00705 {
00706       INT32 cnt;
00707 
00708       if ( gsCurInterfacePanel == SM_PANEL )
00709       {
00710             if ( gpSMCurrentMerc != NULL )
00711             {
00712                   // Check if mouse is in region and if so, adjust...
00713                   if ( IsMouseInRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanelRegion ) )
00714                   {
00715                         HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc, fOn );
00716                   }
00717             }
00718       }
00719       else
00720       {
00721             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00722             {
00723                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID == pSoldier->ubID )
00724                   {
00725                         if ( IsMouseInRegion( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ] ) )
00726                         {
00727                               HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( pSoldier, fOn );
00728                         }
00729                   }
00730             }
00731       }
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00735 void UpdateSMPanel( )
00736 {
00737       BOOLEAN                                   fNearHeigherLevel;
00738       BOOLEAN                                   fNearLowerLevel;
00739       INT8                                      bDirection;
00740       UINT8                                     ubStanceState;
00741 
00742       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00743       {
00744             return;
00745       }
00746 
00747       // Stance
00748       ubStanceState = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubDesiredHeight;
00749 
00750       if ( ubStanceState == NO_DESIRED_HEIGHT )
00751       {
00752             ubStanceState = gAnimControl[ gpSMCurrentMerc->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
00753       }
00754 
00755 
00756       switch( ubStanceState )
00757       {
00758             case ANIM_STAND:
00759 
00760                   gbSMCurStanceObj = 0;
00761                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
00762                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
00763 
00764                   // Disable if we cannot do this!
00765                   if ( !IsValidStance( gpSMCurrentMerc, ANIM_CROUCH ) )
00766                   {
00767                         DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );                        
00768                   }
00769                   break;
00770 
00771             case ANIM_PRONE:
00772                   gbSMCurStanceObj = 2;
00773                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
00774                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
00775                   break;
00776 
00777             case ANIM_CROUCH:
00778                   gbSMCurStanceObj = 1;
00779                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
00780                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
00781 
00782                   // Disable if we cannot do this!
00783                   if ( !IsValidStance( gpSMCurrentMerc, ANIM_PRONE ) )
00784                   {
00785                         DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );                        
00786                   }
00787                   break;
00788       }
00789       
00790       // Stance button done wether we're disabled or not...
00791       if ( gfUIStanceDifferent )
00792       {
00793             //Remove old
00794             if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
00795             {
00796                         RemoveButton( giSMStealthButton );
00797             }
00798             if ( giSMStealthImages != -1 )
00799             {
00800                   UnloadButtonImage( giSMStealthImages );
00801             }
00802 
00803             // Make new
00804             giSMStealthImages = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCE_IMAGES  ] ,gbStanceButPos[ gpSMCurrentMerc->bStealthMode ][gbSMCurStanceObj][0] ,gbStanceButPos[ gpSMCurrentMerc->bStealthMode ][gbSMCurStanceObj][1],-1,gbStanceButPos[ gpSMCurrentMerc->bStealthMode ][gbSMCurStanceObj][2],-1 );
00805 
00806             giSMStealthButton = QuickCreateButton( giSMStealthImages, SM_STEALTHMODE_X, SM_STEALTHMODE_Y,
00807                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1,
00808                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnStealthModeCallback );
00809 
00810             SetButtonFastHelpText( giSMStealthButton, TacticalStr[ TOGGLE_STEALTH_MODE_POPUPTEXT ] );
00811 
00812             gfUIStanceDifferent = FALSE;
00813 
00814             if ( gfAllDisabled )
00815             {
00816                   if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
00817                   {
00818                               DisableButton( giSMStealthButton );
00819                   }
00820             }
00821       }
00822 
00823       if ( gfAllDisabled )
00824       {
00825             return;
00826       }
00827 
00828 
00829       CheckForReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( );
00830 
00831       // Check for any newly added items we need.....
00832       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->fCheckForNewlyAddedItems )
00833       {
00834             // Startup any newly added items....
00835             CheckForAnyNewlyAddedItems( gpSMCurrentMerc );
00836 
00837             gpSMCurrentMerc->fCheckForNewlyAddedItems = FALSE;
00838       }
00839 
00840 
00841 
00842       // Set Disable /Enable UI based on buddy's stats
00843       if (ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->ImageNum != (UINT32) iBurstButtonImages[ gpSMCurrentMerc->bWeaponMode ] )
00844       {
00845             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->ImageNum = iBurstButtonImages[ gpSMCurrentMerc->bWeaponMode ];
00846             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00847       }
00848 
00849       /*
00850       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bDoBurst )
00851       {
00852             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00853             {
00854                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00855             }
00856       }
00857       else
00858       {
00859             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00860             {
00861                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00862             }
00863       }
00864       */
00865 
00866 
00867       // Toggle MUTE button...
00868       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MUTE )
00869       {
00870             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00871             {
00872                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00873             }
00874       }
00875       else
00876       {
00877             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00878             {
00879                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00880             }
00881       }
00882 
00883 
00884       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );           
00885 
00886       GetMercClimbDirection( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, &fNearLowerLevel, &fNearHeigherLevel );
00887 
00888       if ( fNearLowerLevel || fNearHeigherLevel )
00889       {
00890             if ( fNearLowerLevel )
00891             {
00892                   if ( EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, GetAPsToClimbRoof( gpSMCurrentMerc, TRUE ), 0, FALSE ) )
00893                   {
00894                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );            
00895                   }
00896             }
00897 
00898             if ( fNearHeigherLevel )
00899             {
00900                   if ( EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, GetAPsToClimbRoof( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE ), 0, FALSE ) )
00901                   {
00902                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );            
00903                   }
00904             }
00905       }
00906       
00907       if ( FindFenceJumpDirection( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo, gpSMCurrentMerc->bDirection, &bDirection ) )
00908       {
00909             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );            
00910       }
00911 
00912       if ( (gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum) || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00913       {
00914             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
00915       }
00916       else if ( !gfAllDisabled )
00917       {
00918             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
00919       }
00920 
00921 //    if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00922       if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00923       {
00924             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00925             {
00926                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00927             }
00928       }
00929       else
00930       {
00931             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00932             {
00933                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00934             }
00935       }
00936 
00937       if ( gCurrentUIMode == HANDCURSOR_MODE )
00938       {
00939             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00940             {
00941                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00942             }
00943       }
00944       else
00945       {
00946             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00947             {
00948                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00949             }
00950       }
00951 
00952       if ( gCurrentUIMode == TALKCURSOR_MODE )
00953       {
00954             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00955             {
00956                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00957             }
00958       }
00959       else
00960       {
00961             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00962             {
00963                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00964             }
00965       }
00966 
00967       if ( gCurrentUIMode == LOOKCURSOR_MODE )
00968       {
00969             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00970             {
00971                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00972             }
00973       }
00974       else
00975       {
00976             if ( !ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->ubToggleButtonActivated )
00977             {
00978                   ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ( ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00979             }
00980       }
00981 
00982       // If not selected ( or dead ), disable/gray some buttons
00983       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID || ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife < OKLIFE ) || (gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum) || gfSMDisableForItems )
00984       {
00985             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );           
00986             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );       
00987             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
00988             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
00989             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
00990             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
00991             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
00992             if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
00993             {
00994                         DisableButton( giSMStealthButton );
00995             }
00996       }
00997       else
00998       {
00999             // Enable some buttons!
01000             if ( ((IsGunAutofireCapable( gpSMCurrentMerc, HANDPOS ) || IsGunBurstCapable( gpSMCurrentMerc, HANDPOS , FALSE )) && !Weapon[gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].NoSemiAuto ) || IsGrenadeLauncherAttached ( &(gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[HANDPOS]) ) )
01001             {
01002                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );        
01003             }
01004             else
01005             {
01006                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );       
01007             }
01008             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
01009             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
01010             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
01011 
01012             if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
01013             {
01014                         EnableButton( giSMStealthButton );
01015             }
01016       }
01017 
01018       // CJC Dec 4 2002: or if item pickup menu is up
01019       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV) || gfInItemPickupMenu)
01020       {
01021             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
01022       }
01023       else
01024       {
01025             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
01026       }
01027 
01028 }
01029 
01030 extern BOOLEAN CanItemFitInPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObj, INT8 bPos, BOOLEAN fDoingPlacement );
01031 extern INT8        gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ NUM_INV_SLOTS ]; 
01032 
01033 
01034 void ReevaluateItemHatches( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fAllValid )
01035 {
01036       INT32 cnt;
01037 
01038       // if there's an item in the cursor and we're not supposed to just make them all valid
01039       if ( ( gpItemPointer != NULL ) && !fAllValid )
01040       {
01041             // check all inventory positions and mark the ones where cursor item won't fit as invalid 
01042             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01043             {
01044                   gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ cnt ] = !CanItemFitInPosition( pSoldier, gpItemPointer, (INT8)cnt, FALSE );
01045 
01046                   // !!! ATTACHING/MERGING ITEMS IN MAP SCREEN IS NOT SUPPORTED !!!
01047                   // CJC: seems to be supported now...
01048                   //if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
01049                   {
01050                         // Check attachments, override to valid placement if valid merge...
01051                         if ( ValidAttachment( gpItemPointer->usItem, pSoldier->inv[ cnt ].usItem ) )
01052                         {
01053                               gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01054                         }
01055 
01056                         if ( ValidMerge( gpItemPointer->usItem, pSoldier->inv[ cnt ].usItem ) )
01057                         {
01058                               gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01059                         }
01060                   }
01061             }
01062       }
01063       else
01064       {
01065             // mark all inventory positions as valid
01066             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01067             {
01068                   gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01069             }
01070       }
01071 
01072       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01073 }
01074 
01075 
01076 void EnableSMPanelButtons( BOOLEAN fEnable , BOOLEAN fFromItemPickup )
01077 {
01078       if ( fFromItemPickup )
01079       {
01080             // If we have the item pointer up...
01081             // CJC Dec 4 2002: or if item pickup menu is up
01082             //if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01083             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL || gfInItemPickupMenu )
01084             {
01085                   DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( TRUE );
01086             }
01087             else
01088             {
01089                   DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( FALSE );
01090             }
01091 
01092             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01093       }
01094 
01095 
01096       if ( gsCurInterfacePanel == SM_PANEL )
01097       {
01098             if ( fFromItemPickup )
01099             {
01100                   // If we have the item pointer up...
01101                   if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01102                   {
01103                         ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, fEnable );
01104 
01105                         // Turn it all false first....
01106                         InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, FALSE );
01107                         InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, TRUE );
01108 
01109                         gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
01110 
01111                         // Highlight guys ....
01112                         HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8)CurrentSquad( ), gpItemPointer, FALSE );
01113 
01114                   }
01115                   else
01116                   {
01117                         //InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, FALSE );
01118                         gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
01119 
01120                         HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
01121                   }
01122 
01123                   if ( fEnable )
01124                   {
01125                         ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, fEnable );
01126                   }
01127 
01128                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01129             }
01130 
01131             if ( fEnable )
01132             {
01133                   // only enable the following if NOT in shopkeeper's interface
01134                   if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE ) )
01135                   {
01136                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );            
01137                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );        
01138                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
01139                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
01140                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
01141                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
01142                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
01143                         if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
01144                         {
01145                               EnableButton( giSMStealthButton );
01146                         }
01147 
01148                         if ( gfDisableTacticalPanelButtons )
01149                         {
01150                               DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ OPTIONS_BUTTON ] );
01151                               DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
01152                               DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
01153                         }
01154                         else
01155                         {
01156                               EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ OPTIONS_BUTTON ] );
01157                               EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
01158                               EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
01159                         }
01160 
01161 
01162                         //enable the radar map region
01163                         MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
01164 
01165                         gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
01166 
01167             DisableInvRegions( gfSMDisableForItems );
01168                   }
01169 
01170                   if ( !fFromItemPickup )
01171                   {
01172                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ NEXTMERC_BUTTON ] );
01173                         EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ PREVMERC_BUTTON ] );
01174                   }
01175             }
01176             else
01177             {
01178                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );           
01179                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );       
01180                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
01181                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
01182                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
01183                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
01184                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
01185                   if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
01186                   {
01187                               DisableButton( giSMStealthButton );
01188                   }
01189 
01190                   if ( !fFromItemPickup )
01191                   {
01192                         DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ NEXTMERC_BUTTON ] );
01193                         DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ PREVMERC_BUTTON ] );
01194                   }
01195 
01196                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ OPTIONS_BUTTON ] );
01197                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
01198                   DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
01199 
01200                   //disable the radar map
01201                   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
01202             }
01203 
01204             gfAllDisabled = !fEnable;
01205 
01206       }
01207 }
01208 
01209 UINT16 GetSMPanelCurrentMerc( )
01210 {
01211       return( gusSMCurrentMerc );
01212 }

01398 BOOLEAN InitializeSMPanel(  )
01399 {
01400   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
01401 
01402  /*  OK i need to initialize coords here
01403  *  Isnt it cool
01404  *  any questions? joker
01405  */
01406 //    InitializeSMPanelCoords( );
01407       
01408       // failing the CHECKF after this will cause you to lose your mouse
01409       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01410 
01411       if (iResolution == 0)
01412       {
01413       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\inventory_bottom_panel.STI" );
01414       }
01415       else if (iResolution == 1)
01416       {
01417             strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\inventory_bottom_panel_800x600.STI" );
01418       }
01419       else if (iResolution == 2)
01420       {
01421             strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\inventory_bottom_panel_1024x768.STI" );
01422       }
01423 
01424       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSMPanel) );
01425 
01426       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01427       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_gold_front.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01428       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSMObjects ) );
01429 
01430       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01431       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inv_frn.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01432       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSMObjects2 ) );
01433 
01434 
01435       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01436       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\secondary_gun_hidden.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01437       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSecItemHiddenVO ) );
01438 
01439       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01440       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Bars.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01441       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel ) );
01442 
01443       
01444       // Clear inv display stuff
01445       memset( gfSM_HandInvDispText, 0, sizeof( gfSM_HandInvDispText ) );
01446 
01447       // INIT viewport region
01448       // Set global mouse regions for SM panel
01449       // Define region for viewport
01450       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gViewportRegion, 0, 0 ,gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
01451       MSYS_AddRegion( &gViewportRegion );
01452 
01453       // Create buttons
01454       CHECKF( CreateSMPanelButtons( ) );
01455 
01456       // Set viewports
01457       // Define region for panel
01458       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSMPanelRegion, 0, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
01459                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, InvPanelButtonClickCallback ); 
01460       // Add region
01461       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSMPanelRegion);
01462 
01463       //DEfine region for selected guy panel
01464       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanelRegion, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X + SM_SELMERC_FACE_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y + SM_SELMERC_FACE_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
01465                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, SelectedMercButtonMoveCallback, SelectedMercButtonCallback ); 
01466       // Add region
01467       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanelRegion );
01468 
01469 
01470 
01471       //DEfine region for selected guy panel
01472       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSM_SELMERCEnemyIndicatorRegion, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X + 1, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y + 1, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X + INDICATOR_BOX_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y + INDICATOR_BOX_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
01473                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectedMercEnemyIndicatorCallback ); 
01474       // Add region
01475       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSM_SELMERCEnemyIndicatorRegion );
01476 
01477 
01478       //DEfine region for money button
01479       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion, MONEY_X, MONEY_Y, MONEY_X + MONEY_WIDTH, MONEY_Y + MONEY_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01480                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SMInvMoneyButtonCallback ); 
01481       // Add region
01482       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion );
01483 
01484       SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion), TacticalStr[ MONEY_BUTTON_HELP_TEXT ] );
01485 
01486 
01487 
01488       // Check if mouse is in region and if so, adjust...
01489       if ( IsMouseInRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanelRegion ) )
01490       {
01491             HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc, TRUE );
01492       }
01493 
01494 
01495       //DEfine region for selected guy panel
01496       // THIS IS A REGION OF BAR TIPS
01497       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion, SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_X, SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_Y, 
01498                               SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_X + SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_Y + SM_SELMERC_BARS_TIP_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
01499                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectedMercButtonCallback ); 
01500       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion );
01501 
01502       
01503       InitInvSlotInterface( gSMInvPocketXY, &gSMCamoXY, SMInvMoveCallback, SMInvClickCallback, SMInvMoveCammoCallback, SMInvClickCamoCallback, FALSE );
01504 
01505       InitKeyRingInterface( KeyRingItemPanelButtonCallback );
01506 
01507 
01508       // this is important! It will disable buttons like SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON when they're supposed to be disabled - the previous
01509       // disabled state is lost everytime panel is reinitialized, because all the buttons are created from scratch!
01510       if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
01511       {
01512             // empty cursor - enable, not from item pickup
01513             EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE, FALSE );
01514       }
01515       else
01516       {
01517             // full cursor - disable, from item pickup
01518             EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE, TRUE );
01519       }
01520 
01521       return( TRUE );
01522 }
01523 
01524 
01525 BOOLEAN CreateSMPanelButtons( )
01526 {
01527 UINT8 ubString[48];
01528 
01529       giSMStealthImages = -1;
01530       giSMStealthButton = -1;
01531       gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
01532       gfAllDisabled     = FALSE;
01533 
01534       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_buttons.sti", (STR)ubString);
01535       // Load button Graphics
01536       iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ]              = LoadButtonImage(ubString,-1,0,-1,10,-1 );
01537 
01538       iSMPanelImages[ UPDOWN_IMAGES  ]                      = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,9,-1,19,-1 );
01539       iSMPanelImages[ CLIMB_IMAGES  ]                             = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,3,-1,13,-1 );
01540       iSMPanelImages[ STANCEDOWN_IMAGES  ]            = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,8,-1,18,-1 );
01541       iSMPanelImages[ HANDCURSOR_IMAGES  ]            = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,1,-1,11,-1 );
01542       iSMPanelImages[ PREVMERC_IMAGES  ]              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,20,-1,22,-1 );
01543       iSMPanelImages[ NEXTMERC_IMAGES  ]              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,21,-1,23,-1 );
01544       //iSMPanelImages[ BURSTMODE_IMAGES  ]                 = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,7,-1,17,-1 );
01545       iSMPanelImages[ LOOK_IMAGES  ]                              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,2,-1,12,-1 );
01546       iSMPanelImages[ TALK_IMAGES  ]                              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,6,-1,16,-1 );
01547       iSMPanelImages[ MUTE_IMAGES  ]                              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,5,-1,15,-1 );
01548       iSMPanelImages[ OPTIONS_IMAGES  ]                     = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ] ,-1,24,-1,25,-1 );
01549 
01550       iBurstButtonImages[ WM_NORMAL ]                             = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ], -1, 7, -1, -1, -1 );
01551       iBurstButtonImages[ WM_BURST ]                              = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ], -1, 17, -1, -1, -1 );
01552       iBurstButtonImages[ WM_AUTOFIRE ]                     = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ], -1, 17, -1, -1, -1 );
01553       iBurstButtonImages[ WM_ATTACHED_GL ]                        = UseLoadedButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ STANCEUP_IMAGES  ], -1, 26, -1, -1, -1 );

01737 
01738 void    RemoveSMPanelButtons( )
01739 {
01740       UINT32 cnt;
01741 
01742       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_SM_BUTTONS; cnt++ )
01743       {
01744             if ( iSMPanelButtons[ cnt ] != -1 )
01745             {
01746                   RemoveButton( iSMPanelButtons[ cnt ] );
01747             }
01748       }
01749 
01750       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_SM_BUTTON_IMAGES; cnt++ )
01751       {
01752             UnloadButtonImage( iSMPanelImages[ cnt ] );
01753       }
01754 
01755       if ( giSMStealthButton != -1 )
01756       {
01757             RemoveButton( giSMStealthButton );
01758       }
01759 
01760       if ( giSMStealthImages != -1 )
01761       {
01762             UnloadButtonImage( giSMStealthImages );
01763       }
01764       
01765       UnloadButtonImage( iBurstButtonImages[ WM_NORMAL ] );
01766       UnloadButtonImage( iBurstButtonImages[ WM_BURST ] );
01767       UnloadButtonImage( iBurstButtonImages[ WM_ATTACHED_GL ] );
01768       UnloadButtonImage( iBurstButtonImages[ WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST ] );
01769       UnloadButtonImage( iBurstButtonImages[ WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO ] );
01770 
01771 }
01772 
01773 
01774 
01775 
01776 BOOLEAN ShutdownSMPanel( )
01777 {
01778 
01779       // All buttons and regions and video objects and video surfaces will be deleted at shutddown of SGM
01780       // We may want to delete them at the interm as well, to free up room for other panels
01781       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSMPanel );
01782       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSMObjects );
01783       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSMObjects2 );
01784       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSecItemHiddenVO );
01785       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel );
01786 
01787       gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = NOBODY;
01788 
01789       // CJC: delete key ring if open
01790       DeleteKeyRingPopup(); // function will abort if key ring is not up
01791 
01792       // ATE: Delete desc panel if it was open....
01793       if ( gfInItemDescBox )
01794       {
01795             DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
01796       }
01797 
01798 
01799       // Shotdown item slot interface
01800       ShutdownInvSlotInterface( );
01801 
01802       // shutdown keyring interface
01803       ShutdownKeyRingInterface( );
01804       
01805       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSMPanelRegion );
01806       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanelRegion );
01807       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion );
01808       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion );
01809       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSM_SELMERCEnemyIndicatorRegion );
01810 
01811       HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE );
01812 
01813       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gViewportRegion );
01814 
01815 
01816       RemoveSMPanelButtons( );
01817 
01818       return( TRUE );
01819 }
01820 
01821 
01822 void RenderSMPanel( BOOLEAN *pfDirty )
01823 {
01824       INT16 sFontX, sFontY;
01825       UINT16      usX, usY;
01826       wchar_t sString[9];
01827       UINT32      cnt;
01828       static INT16 pStr[ 200 ], pMoraleStr[ 20 ];
01829 
01830       if ( gubSelectSMPanelToMerc != NOBODY )
01831       {
01832             // Give him the panel!
01833             SetSMPanelCurrentMerc( gubSelectSMPanelToMerc );
01834       }
01835 
01836 
01837       // ATE: Don't do anything if we are in stack popup and are refreshing stuff....
01838       if ( ( InItemStackPopup( ) || ( InKeyRingPopup( ) ) ) && (*pfDirty) == DIRTYLEVEL1 )
01839       {
01840             return;
01841       }
01842 
01843       if ( gfCheckForMouseOverItem )
01844       {     
01845             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiMouseOverItemTime ) > 100 )
01846             {
01847                   if ( HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, (INT8)gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos, TRUE ) )
01848                   {
01849                         (*pfDirty) = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01850                   }
01851 
01852                   gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
01853             }
01854       }
01855 
01856       HandleNewlyAddedItems( gpSMCurrentMerc, pfDirty );
01857 
01858       if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
01859       {
01860             HandleItemDescriptionBox( pfDirty );
01861       }
01862 
01863       if ( *pfDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01864       {
01865             //if ( InItemStackPopup( ) )
01866             //{
01867 
01868             //}
01869 
01870             if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
01871             {
01872                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMPanel, 0, INTERFACE_START_X, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01873                   RenderSoldierFace( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y, TRUE );
01874 
01875 
01876                   // ATE: Need these lines here to fix flash bug with face selection box
01877                   if ( gfSMDisableForItems )
01878                   {
01879                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects2, 0, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01880                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_WIDTH , SM_SELMERC_PLATE_HEIGHT );
01881                   }
01882                   else
01883                   {
01884                         if ( gusSelectedSoldier == gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID && gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == OUR_TEAM && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC(  gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
01885                         {
01886                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects, 0, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01887                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_WIDTH , SM_SELMERC_PLATE_HEIGHT );
01888                         }
01889                   }
01890 
01891                   RenderItemDescriptionBox( );
01892             }
01893             else
01894             {
01895 
01896                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMPanel, 0, INTERFACE_START_X, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01897 
01898                   RenderInvBodyPanel( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_BODYINV_X, SM_BODYINV_Y );            
01899 
01900                   // CHECK FOR PANEL STUFF / DEATHS / CLOSURES
01901                   CheckForFacePanelStartAnims( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y );
01902 
01903                   // Hitlight
01904 
01905                   if ( gfSMDisableForItems )
01906                   {
01907                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects2, 0, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01908                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_WIDTH , SM_SELMERC_PLATE_HEIGHT );
01909                   }
01910                   else
01911                   {
01912                         if ( gusSelectedSoldier == gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID && gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == OUR_TEAM && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC(  gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
01913                         {
01914                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects, 0, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01915                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_SELMERC_PLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_Y, SM_SELMERC_PLATE_WIDTH , SM_SELMERC_PLATE_HEIGHT );
01916                         }
01917                   }
01918 
01919                   // Render faceplate
01920                   //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects2, 1, SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01921                   //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_X, SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_Y, SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_NAMEPLATE_HEIGHT );
01922 
01923                   // Blit position
01924                   //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
01925                   //{
01926                         //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSMObjects, gbSMCurStanceObj, SM_POSITIONB_X, SM_POSITIONB_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01927                   //}
01928                   //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( SM_POSITIONB_X, SM_POSITIONB_Y, SM_POSITIONB_WIDTH , SM_POSITIONB_HEIGHT );
01929 
01930 
01931                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
01932 
01933 
01934                   // Render Values for stats!
01935                   // Set font drawing to saved buffer
01936                   SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01937 
01938                   SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
01939                   SetFontForeground( STATS_TITLE_FONT_COLOR );
01940                   for( cnt = 0; cnt < 5; cnt++ )
01941                   {
01942                         mprintf( INTERFACE_START_X + 92, ( INT16 )( INV_INTERFACE_START_Y + 7 + cnt * 10 ), pShortAttributeStrings[ cnt  ] );
01943                         mprintf( INTERFACE_START_X + 137, ( INT16 )( INV_INTERFACE_START_Y + 7 + cnt * 10 ), pShortAttributeStrings[ cnt + 5 ] );
01944                   }
01945 
01946                   mprintf( SM_ARMOR_LABEL_X - StringPixLength( pInvPanelTitleStrings[0], BLOCKFONT2 ) / 2, SM_ARMOR_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 0 ] );
01947                   mprintf( SM_ARMOR_PERCENT_X, SM_ARMOR_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
01948 
01949                   mprintf( SM_WEIGHT_LABEL_X - StringPixLength( pInvPanelTitleStrings[1], BLOCKFONT2 ), SM_WEIGHT_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 1 ] );
01950                   mprintf( SM_WEIGHT_PERCENT_X, SM_WEIGHT_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
01951                   
01952                   mprintf( SM_CAMMO_LABEL_X - StringPixLength( pInvPanelTitleStrings[2], BLOCKFONT2 ), SM_CAMMO_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 2 ] );
01953                   mprintf( SM_CAMMO_PERCENT_X, SM_CAMMO_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
01954 
01955                   UpdateStatColor( gpSMCurrentMerc-> uiChangeAgilityTime, ( BOOLEAN ) ( gpSMCurrentMerc->usValueGoneUp & AGIL_INCREASE? TRUE: FALSE ) );
01956 
01957                   swprintf( sString, L"%2d", gpSMCurrentMerc->bAgility );
01958                   FindFontRightCoordinates(SM_AGI_X, SM_AGI_Y ,SM_STATS_WIDTH ,SM_STATS_HEIGHT ,sString, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
01959                   mprintf( usX, usY , sString ); 
01960 
01961                   UpdateStatColor( gpSMCurrentMerc-> uiChangeDexterityTime,( BOOLEAN ) ( gpSMCurrentMerc->usValueGoneUp & DEX_INCREASE? TRUE: FALSE )  );
01962

02016                   {
02017                         SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02018                         SetFontForeground( STATS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
02019                   }
02020                   else

02070             mprintf( sFontX + 5, sFontY, L"%s", gpSMCurrentMerc->name );
02071 
02072       }
02073 
02074       if ( *pfDirty != DIRTYLEVEL0 )
02075       {
02076             // UPdate stats!
02077             if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife != 0 )
02078             {

02080       {
02081                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ VEHICLE_VITAL_STATS_POPUPTEXT ], gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife, gpSMCurrentMerc->bLifeMax, gpSMCurrentMerc->bBreath, gpSMCurrentMerc->bBreathMax );
02082                     SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion), pStr );
02083       }

02085       {
02086                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, gzLateLocalizedString[ 16 ], gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife, gpSMCurrentMerc->bLifeMax );
02087                     SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ]), pStr );

02092                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ MERC_VITAL_STATS_POPUPTEXT ], gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife, gpSMCurrentMerc->bLifeMax, gpSMCurrentMerc->bBreath, gpSMCurrentMerc->bBreathMax, pMoraleStr );
02093                     SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion), pStr );
02094       }
02095             }
02096             else

02099             }
02100 
02101             //if we are in the shop keeper interface
02102             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02103                   SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &gSM_SELMERCBarsRegion, SkiHelpTextDoneCallBack );
02104 
02105             // display AP
02106             if ( !( gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
02107             {
02108                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= OKLIFE )
02109                   {
02110                         SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
02111                         //if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->sLastTarget != NOWHERE && !EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, MinAPsToAttack( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpSMCurrentMerc->sLastTarget, FALSE ), 0, FALSE ) || GetUIApsToDisplay( gpSMCurrentMerc ) < 0 ) 
02112                         if ( !EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, MinAPsToAttack( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpSMCurrentMerc->sLastTarget, FALSE ), 0, FALSE ) || GetUIApsToDisplay( gpSMCurrentMerc ) < 0 ) 
02113                         {
02114                               SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02115                               SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED );
02116                         }
02117                         else
02118                         {
02119                               if ( MercUnderTheInfluence( gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
02120                               {
02121                                     SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02122                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTBLUE );
02123                               }
02124                               else if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bStealthMode )
02125                               {
02126                                     SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02127                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                                                
02128                               }
02129                               else
02130                               {
02131                                     SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02132                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGRAY );
02133                               }
02134                         }
02135 
02136                         gprintfRestore( SM_SELMERC_AP_X, SM_SELMERC_AP_Y, L"%2d", GetUIApsToDisplay( gpSMCurrentMerc ) );
02137                         VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( SM_SELMERC_AP_X, SM_SELMERC_AP_Y, SM_SELMERC_AP_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_AP_HEIGHT, TINYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%d", GetUIApsToDisplay( gpSMCurrentMerc ) );
02138                         mprintf( sFontX, SM_SELMERC_AP_Y, L"%d", GetUIApsToDisplay( gpSMCurrentMerc ) );
02139                   }
02140 
02141                   // Display bars
02142                   DrawLifeUIBarEx( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_X, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_Y, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_HEIGHT, TRUE , FRAME_BUFFER );
02143 
02144       if ( !(gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT ) )
02145       {
02146                     DrawBreathUIBarEx( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_BREATH_X, SM_SELMERC_BREATH_Y, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_HEALTH_HEIGHT, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
02147                     DrawMoraleUIBarEx( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_MORALE_X, SM_SELMERC_MORALE_Y, SM_SELMERC_MORALE_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_MORALE_HEIGHT, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
02148       }
02149             }
02150 
02151       }
02152 
02153 /*  I added this
02154  *  any questions? joker
02155  */
02156       if( fRenderRadarScreen == TRUE )
02157       {
02158             // Render clock
02159             RenderClock( INTERFACE_CLOCK_X, INTERFACE_CLOCK_Y );
02160             CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( INTERFACE_CLOCK_X, INTERFACE_CLOCK_Y );
02161             RenderTownIDString( );
02162       }
02163       else
02164       {
02165             RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( );
02166       }
02167 
02168       UpdateSMPanel( );
02169 
02170   
02171       //HandlePanelFaceAnimations( gpSMCurrentMerc );
02172 
02173       HandleSoldierFaceFlash( gpSMCurrentMerc, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y );
02174 
02175       // Render items in guy's hand!
02176       HandleRenderInvSlots( gpSMCurrentMerc, *pfDirty );
02177 
02178       if ( gfSMDisableForItems && (*pfDirty) != DIRTYLEVEL0 )
02179       {
02180             UINT8  *pDestBuf;
02181             UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02182             SGPRect ClipRect;
02183 
02184             ClipRect.iLeft     = 87;
02185             ClipRect.iRight  = 536;
02186             ClipRect.iTop           = INV_INTERFACE_START_Y;
02187             ClipRect.iBottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
02188             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
02189             Blt16BPPBufferHatchRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
02190             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02191       }
02192 
02193 }
02194 
02195 void UpdateStatColor( UINT32 uiTimer, BOOLEAN fIncrease )
02196 {
02197       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= OKLIFE )
02198       {
02199             if( ( GetJA2Clock()  < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + uiTimer) && ( uiTimer != 0 ) )
02200             {
02201                   if( fIncrease )
02202                   {
02203                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
02204                   }
02205                   else
02206                   {
02207                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02208                   }
02209             }
02210             else
02211             {
02212                   SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02213                   SetFontForeground( STATS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
02214             }
02215       }
02216       else
02217       {
02218             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02219             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );
02220       }
02221 }

02224 
02225 void SMInvMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02226 {
02227       UINT32 uiHandPos;
02228 
02229       uiHandPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02230 
02231       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02232       {
02233             return;
02234       }
02235 
02236       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
02237             return;
02238 
02239       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
02240       {
02241       }
02242       else if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02243       {
02244             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
02245             {
02246                   // Setup a timer....
02247                   guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
02248                   gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
02249                   gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = (INT8)uiHandPos;
02250             }
02251       }
02252       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02253       {
02254             //gfSM_HandInvDispText[ uiHandPos ] = 1;
02255             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
02256             {
02257                   HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, (INT8)uiHandPos, FALSE );
02258                   gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
02259                   fInterfacePanelDirty          = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02260             }
02261       }     
02262 }
02263 
02264 void InvPanelButtonClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02265 {
02266       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02267       {
02268             return;
02269       }
02270       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
02271       {
02272       }
02273       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
02274       {
02275 
02276       }
02277 }
02278 
02279 
02280 void SMInvMoveCammoCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02281 {
02282 
02283       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02284       {
02285             return;
02286       }
02287       else if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
02288       {
02289             // Setup a timer....
02290             guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
02291             gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
02292             gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = NO_SLOT;
02293       }
02294       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02295       {
02296             //gfSM_HandInvDispText[ uiHandPos ] = 1;
02297             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, (INT8)NO_SLOT, FALSE );
02298             gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
02299       }     
02300 }

02302 
02303 void SMInvClickCamoCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02304 {
02305       //UINT16 usNewItemIndex;
02306       UINT8  ubSrcID, ubDestID;
02307   BOOLEAN fGoodAPs;
02308 
02309       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02310       {
02311             return;
02312       }
02313 
02314       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02315       {
02316             // Apply camo ( if we have something in cursor... )
02317             // If we do not have an item in hand, start moving it
02318 
02319             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
02320             {
02321                   // ATE: OK, get source, dest guy if different... check for and then charge appropriate APs
02322                   ubSrcID  = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID;
02323                   ubDestID = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID;
02324 
02325                   //if ( ubSrcID == ubDestID )
02326                   {
02327                         // We are doing this ourselve, continue
02328                         if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02329                         {
02330                               //usNewItemIndex = gpItemPointer->usItem;
02331 
02332                               // Try to apply camo....
02333                               if ( ApplyCammo( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, &fGoodAPs ) )
02334                               {
02335                                     if ( fGoodAPs )
02336                                     {
02337                                       // Dirty 
02338                                       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02339 
02340                                       // Check if it's the same now!
02341                                       if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02342                                       {
02343                                             gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
02344                                             EndItemPointer( );
02345                                       }
02346 
02347                                       // Say OK acknowledge....
02348                                       DoMercBattleSound( gpSMCurrentMerc, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
02349             }
02350                               }
02351                               else if ( ApplyCanteen( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, &fGoodAPs ) )
02352                               {
02353                                     // Dirty 
02354             if ( fGoodAPs )
02355             {
02356                                       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02357 
02358                                       // Check if it's the same now!
02359                                       if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02360                                       {
02361                                             gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
02362                                             EndItemPointer( );
02363                                       }
02364             }
02365                               }
02366                               else if ( ApplyElixir( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer, &fGoodAPs ) )
02367                               {
02368             if ( fGoodAPs )
02369             {
02370                                     // Dirty 
02371                                       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02372 
02373                                       // Check if it's the same now!
02374                                       if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02375                                       {
02376                                             gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
02377                                             EndItemPointer( );
02378                                       }
02379 
02380                                       // Say OK acknowledge....
02381                                 DoMercBattleSound( gpSMCurrentMerc, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
02382             }
02383                               }
02384                               else if ( ApplyDrugs( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpItemPointer ) )
02385                               {
02386                                     // Dirty 
02387                                     fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02388 
02389                                     // Check if it's the same now!
02390                                     if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02391                                     {
02392                                           gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
02393                                           EndItemPointer( );
02394                                     }
02395 
02396                                     /*
02397                                     // COMMENTED OUT DUE TO POTENTIAL SERIOUS PROBLEMS WITH STRATEGIC EVENT SYSTEM
02398 
02399                                     if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile == LARRY_NORMAL )
02400                                     {
02401                                           // Larry's taken something!
02402                                           gpSMCurrentMerc = SwapLarrysProfiles( gpSMCurrentMerc );
02403                                     }
02404                                     */
02405 
02406 
02407                                     // Say OK acknowledge....
02408                                     DoMercBattleSound( gpSMCurrentMerc, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
02409 
02410                               }
02411                               else
02412                               {
02413                                     // Send message
02414                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_DO_INV_STUFF_STR ] );
02415                               }
02416                         }
02417                   } 
02418             }
02419       }
02420       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
02421       {
02422 
02423       }
02424 }
