02426 
02427 BOOLEAN HandleNailsVestFetish( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT32 uiHandPos, UINT16 usReplaceItem )
02428 {
02429       BOOLEAN fRefuse = FALSE;
02430 
02431       // OK are we nails?
02432       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == 34 )
02433       {
02434             // if this the VEST POS?
02435             if ( uiHandPos == VESTPOS )
02436             {
02437                   // Are we trying to pick it up?
02438                   if ( usReplaceItem == NOTHING )
02439                   {
02440                         fRefuse = TRUE;
02441                   }
02442                   else
02443                   {
02444                         // Do we have nothing or the leather vest or kevlar leather vest?
02445                         if ( Item[usReplaceItem].leatherjacket ||
02446                                      usReplaceItem == COMPOUND18 ||
02447                                      usReplaceItem == JAR_QUEEN_CREATURE_BLOOD )
02448                         {
02449                               // This is good....
02450                               fRefuse = FALSE;
02451                         }
02452                         else
02453                         {
02454                               fRefuse = TRUE;               
02455                         }
02456                   }
02457 
02458                   if ( fRefuse )
02459                   {
02460                         // Say quote!
02461                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, 61 );
02462                         return( TRUE );
02463                   }
02464             }
02465       }
02466 
02467       return( FALSE );
02468 }
02469 
02470 BOOLEAN UIHandleItemPlacement( UINT8 ubHandPos, UINT16 usOldItemIndex, UINT16 usNewItemIndex, BOOLEAN fDeductPoints )
02471 {
02472       if ( _KeyDown(CTRL) )
02473       {
02474             CleanUpStack( &( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ ubHandPos ] ), gpItemPointer );
02475             if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02476             {
02477                   EndItemPointer( );
02478             }
02479             return( TRUE );
02480       }
02481 
02482       // Try to place here                
02483       if ( PlaceObject( gpSMCurrentMerc, ubHandPos, gpItemPointer ) )
02484       {
02485             if ( fDeductPoints )
02486             {
02487                   // Deduct points
02488                   if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02489                   {
02490                         DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier,  2, 0 );
02491                   }
02492                   if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02493                   {
02494                         DeductPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc,  2, 0 );
02495                   }
02496             }
02497 
02498             HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( gpSMCurrentMerc, ubHandPos, usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex );
02499 
02500             // Dirty 
02501             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02502 
02503             // Check if cursor is empty now
02504             if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02505             {
02506                   EndItemPointer( );
02507             }
02508 
02509             if ( gpItemPointerSoldier != gpSMCurrentMerc )
02510             {
02511                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ITEM_PASSED_TO_MERC ], ShortItemNames[ usNewItemIndex ], gpSMCurrentMerc->name );            
02512             }
02513 
02514             // UPDATE ITEM POINTER.....
02515             gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
02516 
02517             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
02518             {
02519                   ReevaluateItemHatches( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE );
02520             }
02521 
02522             // Set cursor back to normal mode...
02523             guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;     
02524 
02525             return( TRUE );
02526 
02527       }
02528       else
02529       {
02530             return( FALSE );
02531       }
02532       
02533 }
02534 
02535 void SMInvClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02536 {
02537       UINT32 uiHandPos;
02538       // Copyies of values
02539       UINT16 usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex;
02540       UINT16 usItemPrevInItemPointer;
02541       BOOLEAN fNewItem = FALSE;
02542       static BOOLEAN    fRightDown = FALSE;
02543       static BOOLEAN    fLeftDown = FALSE;
02544 
02545       uiHandPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02546 
02547       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
02548       {
02549             return;
02550       }
02551 
02552       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02553       {
02554             return;
02555       }
02556 
02557       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
02558       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02559       {
02560             // and this inventory slot is hatched out
02561             if( ShouldSoldierDisplayHatchOnItem( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, (INT16)uiHandPos ) )
02562             {
02563                   // it means that item is a copy of one in the player's offer area, so we treat it as if the slot was empty (ignore)
02564                   // if the cursor has an item in it, we still ignore the click, because handling swaps in this situation would be
02565                   // ugly, we'd have to the the swap, then make the bOwnerSlot of the item just picked up a -1 in its offer area spot.
02566                   return;
02567             }
02568       }
02569 
02570 
02571       //if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02572       //{
02573       //    fLeftDown = TRUE;
02574       //}
02575       //else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP && fLeftDown )
02576       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02577       {
02578             fLeftDown = FALSE;
02579 
02580             // If we do not have an item in hand, start moving it
02581             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
02582             {
02583 
02584                   // Return if empty
02585                   if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
02586                         return;
02587 
02588                   if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID != gusSelectedSoldier )
02589                   {
02590                         SelectSoldier( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
02591                   }
02592 
02593                   // OK, check if this is Nails, and we're in the vest position , don't allow it to come off....
02594                   if ( HandleNailsVestFetish( gpSMCurrentMerc, uiHandPos, NOTHING ) )
02595                   {
02596                         return;
02597                   }
02598 
02599                   if ( _KeyDown(CTRL) )
02600                   {
02601                         CleanUpStack( &( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ] ), NULL );
02602                         return;
02603                   }
02604                   
02605                   // Turn off new item glow!
02606                   gpSMCurrentMerc->bNewItemCount[ uiHandPos ] = 0;
02607 
02608                   usOldItemIndex = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
02609 
02610                   // move item into the mouse cursor
02611                   BeginItemPointer( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos );
02612 
02613                   //if we are in the shopkeeper interface
02614                   if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02615                   {
02616                         // pick up item from regular inventory slot into cursor OR try to sell it ( unless CTRL is held down )
02617                         BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_INVENTORY, ( INT8 ) uiHandPos, ( BOOLEAN )!gfKeyState[ CTRL ] );
02618                   }
02619 
02620                   HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( gpSMCurrentMerc, uiHandPos, usOldItemIndex, NOTHING );
02621 
02622                   // HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, (INT8)uiHandPos, FALSE );
02623             }
02624             else  // item in cursor
02625             {
02626                   UINT8             ubSrcID, ubDestID;
02627                   BOOLEAN           fOKToGo = FALSE;
02628                   BOOLEAN           fDeductPoints = FALSE;
02629 
02630                   // ATE: OK, get source, dest guy if different... check for and then charge appropriate APs
02631                   ubSrcID  = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID;
02632                   ubDestID = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID;
02633 
02634                   if ( ubSrcID == ubDestID )
02635                   {
02636                         // We are doing this ourselve, continue
02637                         fOKToGo = TRUE;
02638                   } 
02639                   else
02640                   {
02641                         // These guys are different....
02642                         fDeductPoints = TRUE;
02643 
02644                         // First check points for src guy
02645                         if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02646                         {
02647                               if ( EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, 3, 0, TRUE ) )
02648                               {
02649                                     fOKToGo = TRUE;
02650                               }
02651                         }
02652                         else
02653                         {
02654                               fOKToGo = TRUE;
02655                         }
02656 
02657                         // Should we go on?
02658                         if ( fOKToGo )
02659                         {
02660                               if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02661                               {
02662                                     if ( EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, 3, 0, TRUE ) )
02663                                     {
02664                                           fOKToGo = TRUE;
02665                                     }
02666                                     else
02667                                     {
02668                                           fOKToGo = FALSE;
02669                                     }
02670                               }
02671                         }
02672                   }
02673 
02674                   if ( fOKToGo )
02675                   {
02676                         // OK, check if this is Nails, and we're in the vest position , don't allow it to come off....
02677                         if ( HandleNailsVestFetish( gpSMCurrentMerc, uiHandPos, gpItemPointer->usItem ) )
02678                         {
02679                               return;
02680                         }
02681 
02682                         usOldItemIndex = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
02683                         usNewItemIndex = gpItemPointer->usItem;
02684 
02685                         if ( uiHandPos == HANDPOS || uiHandPos == SECONDHANDPOS || uiHandPos == HELMETPOS || uiHandPos == VESTPOS || uiHandPos == LEGPOS )
02686                         {
02687                               //if ( ValidAttachmentClass( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
02688                               if ( ValidAttachment( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
02689                               {
02690                                     // it's an attempt to attach; bring up the inventory panel
02691                                     if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
02692                                     {
02693                                           InitItemDescriptionBox( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos, SM_ITEMDESC_START_X, SM_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0 );
02694                                     }
02695                                     return;
02696                               }
02697                               else if ( ValidMerge( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
02698                               {
02699                                     // bring up merge requestor
02700                                     gubHandPos = (UINT8) uiHandPos;
02701                                     gusOldItemIndex = usOldItemIndex;
02702                                     gusNewItemIndex = usNewItemIndex;
02703                                     gfDeductPoints = fDeductPoints;
02704 
02705                                     if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02706                                     {
02707                                           //the only way to merge items is to pick them up.  In SKI when you pick up an item, the cursor is
02708                                           //locked in a region, free it up.
02709                                           FreeMouseCursor();
02710 
02711                                           DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, Message[ STR_MERGE_ITEMS ], SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MergeMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
02712                                     }
02713                                     else
02714                                           DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, Message[ STR_MERGE_ITEMS ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MergeMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
02715                                     return;
02716                               }
02717                               // else handle normally
02718                         }
02719 
02720 
02721                         // remember the item type currently in the item pointer
02722                         usItemPrevInItemPointer = gpItemPointer->usItem;
02723 
02724                         if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02725                         {
02726                               // If it's just been purchased or repaired, mark it as a "new item"
02727                               fNewItem = ( BOOLEAN ) ( gMoveingItem.uiFlags & ( ARMS_INV_JUST_PURCHASED | ARMS_INV_ITEM_REPAIRED ) );
02728                         }
02729 
02730                         // try to place the item in the cursor into this inventory slot
02731                         if ( UIHandleItemPlacement( (UINT8) uiHandPos, usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex, fDeductPoints ) )
02732                         {
02733                               // it worked!  if we're in the SKI...
02734                               if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02735                               {
02736                                     SetNewItem( gpSMCurrentMerc, ( UINT8 ) uiHandPos, fNewItem );
02737 
02738                                     // and the cursor is now empty
02739                                     if( gpItemPointer == NULL )
02740                                     {
02741                                           // clean up
02742                                           memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02743                                           SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
02744                                     }
02745                                     else
02746                                     {
02747                                           // if we're holding something else in the pointer now
02748                                           if ( usItemPrevInItemPointer != gpItemPointer->usItem )
02749                                           {
02750                                                 // pick up item swapped out of inventory slot into cursor (don't try to sell)
02751                                                 BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_INVENTORY, -1, FALSE );
02752                                           }
02753                                           else
02754                                           {
02755                                                 // otherwise, leave the cursor as is, means more items were picked up at once than can be placed in this slot
02756                                                 // we deal with this by leaving the remainder in the cursor, to be put down elsewhere using subsequent clicks
02757                                           }
02758                                     }
02759                               }
02760 
02761                               // Setup a timer....
02762                               //guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
02763                               //gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
02764                               //gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = (INT8)uiHandPos;
02765                         }
02766 
02767                         /*
02768                         // Try to place here                
02769                         if ( PlaceObject( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos, gpItemPointer ) )
02770                         {
02771                         
02772                               if ( fDeductPoints )
02773                               {
02774                                     // Deduct points
02775                                     if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02776                                     {
02777                                           DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier,  2, 0 );
02778                                     }
02779                                     if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
02780                                     {
02781                                           DeductPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc,  2, 0 );
02782                                     }
02783                               }
02784 
02785                               HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( gpSMCurrentMerc, uiHandPos, usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex );
02786 
02787                               // Dirty 
02788                               fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02789 
02790                               // Check if it's the same now!
02791                               if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
02792                               {
02793                                     EndItemPointer( );
02794                               }
02795 
02796                               // Setup a timer....
02797                               guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
02798                               gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
02799                               gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = (INT8)uiHandPos;
02800 
02801                         }
02802                         */
02803                   }
02804             }
02805       }
02806       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
02807       {
02808             fRightDown = TRUE;
02809       }
02810       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP && fRightDown )
02811       {
02812             fRightDown = FALSE;
02813 
02814             // Return if empty
02815             if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
02816                   return;
02817 
02818             // CJC: OK, get source, dest guy if different, don't allow panels to be brought up
02819             /*
02820             if ( gpItemPointer && gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID != gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID )
02821             {
02822                   return;
02823             }
02824             */
02825 
02826             // Turn off new item glow!
02827             gpSMCurrentMerc->bNewItemCount[ uiHandPos ] = 0;
02828 
02829             // Some global stuff here - for esc, etc
02830             // Check for # of slots in item
02831             if( ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].ubNumberOfObjects > 1 && ItemSlotLimit( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem, (UINT8)uiHandPos ) > 0 ) && ( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN ) )
02832             {
02833                   if ( !InItemStackPopup( )  )
02834                   {
02835 
02836                         //InitItemStackPopup( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos, SM_ITEMDESC_START_X, SM_ITEMDESC_START_Y, SM_ITEMDESC_WIDTH, SM_ITEMDESC_HEIGHT );
02837                         InitItemStackPopup( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos, 216, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y, 314, ( SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_START_Y ) );
02838 
02839                   }
02840             }
02841             else
02842             {
02843                   if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
02844                   {
02845                         InitItemDescriptionBox( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos, SM_ITEMDESC_START_X, SM_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0 );
02846                   }
02847             }
02848       }
02849       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02850       {
02851             fRightDown = FALSE;
02852             fLeftDown = FALSE;
02853       }
02854 
02855 }
02856 
02857 void MergeMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 ubExitValue )
02858 {
02859       if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
02860       {
02861             AttachObject( gpItemPointerSoldier, &( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ gubHandPos ] ), gpItemPointer );
02862 
02863             // re-evaluate repairs
02864             gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
02865 
02866             if (gpItemPointer->usItem == NOTHING)
02867             {
02868                   // merge item consumed
02869                   EndItemPointer();
02870                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02871             }
02872       }
02873       else
02874       {
02875             UIHandleItemPlacement( gubHandPos, gusOldItemIndex, gusNewItemIndex, gfDeductPoints );
02876       }
02877 }
02878 
02879 void HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fOn )
02880 {
02881       FACETYPE *pFace;
02882       INT16             sGridNo;
02883 
02884       if ( pSoldier == NULL )
02885       {
02886             return;
02887       }
02888 
02889       if ( fOn )
02890       {
02891             // Check if we are waiting to continue move...
02892             if ( CheckForMercContMove( pSoldier ) )
02893             {
02894                   // Display 'cont' on face....
02895                   // Get face
02896                   pFace = &gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ];
02897                   
02898                   pFace->fDisplayTextOver = FACE_DRAW_TEXT_OVER;
02899                   wcscpy( pFace->zDisplayText, TacticalStr[ CONTINUE_OVER_FACE_STR ] );
02900 
02901                   sGridNo = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
02902 
02903                   if ( pSoldier->bGoodContPath )
02904                   {
02905                         sGridNo = pSoldier->sContPathLocation;
02906                   }
02907 
02908                   // While our mouse is here, draw a path!
02909                   PlotPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
02910             }
02911       }
02912       else
02913       {
02914             // Remove 'cont' on face....
02915             // Get face
02916             pFace = &gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ];
02917             
02918             pFace->fDisplayTextOver = FACE_ERASE_TEXT_OVER;
02919 
02920             // Erase path!
02921             ErasePath( TRUE );
02922       }
02923 
02924       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02925 }
02926 
02927 void SelectedMercButtonMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02928 {
02929       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc == NULL )
02930       {
02931             return;
02932       }
02933 
02934       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
02935       {
02936             HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc, TRUE );
02937       }
02938       else if ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
02939       {
02940             HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc, FALSE );
02941       }
02942 
02943 }
02944 
02945 
02946 
02947 
02948 void SelectedMercButtonCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02949 {
02950       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle;
02951 
02952       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc == NULL )
02953       {
02954             return;
02955       }
02956 
02957       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
02958       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02959             return;
02960 
02961       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02962       {
02963             return;
02964       }
02965       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02966       {
02967             // ATE: Don't if this guy can't....
02968             if ( !gfSMDisableForItems )
02969             {
02970                   if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) )
02971                   {
02972                         pVehicle = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( gpSMCurrentMerc->iVehicleId );
02973 
02974                         HandleLocateSelectMerc( pVehicle->ubID, 0 );
02975                   }
02976                   else
02977                   {
02978                         if ( CheckForMercContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
02979                         {
02980                               // Continue
02981                               ContinueMercMovement( gpSMCurrentMerc );
02982                               ErasePath( TRUE );
02983                         }
02984                         else  
02985                         {
02986                               HandleLocateSelectMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, 0 );
02987                         }
02988                   }
02989             }
02990       }
02991       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
02992       {
02993             // ATE: Cannot get out by right clicking...
02994             //if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
02995             {
02996                   //if ( !gfSMDisableForItems || ( gfSMDisableForItems && gpItemPointer == NULL ) )
02997                   {
02998                         // Delete desc
02999                         if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
03000                         {
03001                               DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
03002                         }
03003                   
03004                         gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
03005                         gbNewPanel        = TEAM_PANEL;
03006                   }
03007             }
03008       }
03009 }
03010 
03011 
03012 void SelectedMercEnemyIndicatorCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03013 {
03014       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc == NULL )
03015       {
03016             return;
03017       }
03018 
03019       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
03020       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03021             return;
03022 
03023       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
03024       {
03025             return;
03026       }
03027       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
03028       {
03029             // ATE: Don't if this guy can't....
03030             if ( !gfSMDisableForItems )
03031             {
03032                   if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) )
03033                   {
03034                   }
03035                   else
03036                   {
03037                         if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bOppCnt > 0 )
03038                         {
03039                               CycleVisibleEnemies( gpSMCurrentMerc );
03040                         }
03041                         else
03042                         {
03043                               SelectedMercButtonCallback( pRegion, iReason );
03044                         }
03045                   }
03046             }
03047       }
03048 }

03050 
03051 
03052 void BtnStanceUpCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03053 {
03054       INT8 bNewStance;
03055 
03056       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03057             return;
03058 
03059       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03060       {
03061             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03062       }
03063       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03064       {
03065             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03066 
03067             bNewStance = gAnimControl[ gpSMCurrentMerc->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
03068 
03069             if ( bNewStance == ANIM_CROUCH )
03070             {
03071                   bNewStance = ANIM_STAND;
03072             }
03073             else if ( bNewStance == ANIM_PRONE )
03074             {
03075                   bNewStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
03076             }
03077 
03078             UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, bNewStance );
03079 
03080       }
03081       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03082       {
03083 
03084             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03085       }
03086       
03087 }
03088 
03089 
03090 void BtnUpdownCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03091 {
03092       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03093             return;
03094 
03095       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03096       {
03097             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03098       }
03099       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03100       {
03101             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03102 
03103             //gsInterfaceLevel = gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel;
03104 
03105             // Change interface level via HandleUI handler
03106             UIHandleChangeLevel( NULL );
03107 
03108             // Remember soldier's new value
03109             gpSMCurrentMerc->bUIInterfaceLevel = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
03110       }
03111       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03112       {
03113             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03114       }
03115 
03116 }
03117       
03118 void BtnClimbCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03119 {
03120       BOOLEAN                                   fNearHeigherLevel;
03121       BOOLEAN                                   fNearLowerLevel;
03122       INT8                                      bDirection;
03123 
03124       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03125             return;
03126 
03127       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03128       {
03129             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03130       }
03131       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03132       {
03133             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03134 
03135             GetMercClimbDirection( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, &fNearLowerLevel, &fNearHeigherLevel );
03136 
03137             if ( fNearLowerLevel )
03138             {
03139                   BeginSoldierClimbDownRoof( gpSMCurrentMerc );
03140             }
03141             if ( fNearHeigherLevel )
03142             {
03143                   BeginSoldierClimbUpRoof( gpSMCurrentMerc );
03144             }
03145 
03146             if ( FindFenceJumpDirection( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpSMCurrentMerc->sGridNo, gpSMCurrentMerc->bDirection, &bDirection ) )
03147             {
03148                   BeginSoldierClimbFence( gpSMCurrentMerc );
03149             }
03150 
03151       }
03152       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03153       {
03154             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03155       }
03156

03158 
03159 void BtnStanceDownCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03160 {
03161       INT8 bNewStance;
03162 
03163       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03164             return;
03165 
03166       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03167       {
03168             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03169       }
03170       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03171       {
03172             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03173 
03174             bNewStance = gAnimControl[ gpSMCurrentMerc->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
03175 
03176             if ( bNewStance == ANIM_STAND )
03177             {
03178                   bNewStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
03179             }
03180             else if ( bNewStance == ANIM_CROUCH )
03181             {
03182                   bNewStance = ANIM_PRONE;
03183             }
03184 
03185             UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID, bNewStance );
03186 
03187       }
03188       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03189       {
03190             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03191       }
03192       
03193 }

03209             gfUIStanceDifferent           = TRUE;
03210             gfPlotNewMovement             = TRUE;
03211             fInterfacePanelDirty    = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03212       }
03213       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03214       {
03215             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03216       }
03217 
03218 }

03245 void BtnMuteCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03246 {
03247       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03248             return;
03249 
03250       if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03251       {
03252             if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MUTE )
03253             {
03254                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MUTE_OFF_STR ], gpSMCurrentMerc->name );
03255                   gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_MUTE );
03256             }
03257             else
03258             {
03259                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MUTE_ON_STR ], gpSMCurrentMerc->name );
03260                   gpSMCurrentMerc->uiStatusFlags |= ( SOLDIER_MUTE );
03261             }
03262       }
03263 
03264 }

03266 
03267 void BtnPrevMercCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03268 {
03269       INT16 sID;
03270 
03271       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
03272             return;
03273 
03274       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03275       {
03276             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03277       }
03278       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03279       {
03280             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03281 
03282             sID = FindPrevActiveAndAliveMerc( gpSMCurrentMerc, TRUE, TRUE );
03283 
03284             gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = (UINT8)sID;
03285 
03286             if ( !gfInItemPickupMenu )
03287             {
03288                   //if we are in the shop keeper interface
03289                   if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03290                   {
03291                         LocateSoldier( sID, DONTSETLOCATOR );
03292                         // refresh background for player slots (in case item values change due to Flo's discount)
03293                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
03294                   }
03295                   else
03296                         LocateSoldier( sID, SETLOCATOR );
03297             }
03298 
03299             //if the user is in the shop keeper interface and is in the item desc
03300             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03301             {
03302                   if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
03303                   {
03304                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
03305                   }
03306             }
03307       }
03308       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03309       {
03310             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03311       }
03312       
03313 }

03626 //    InitializeTEAMPanelCoords( );
03627       // INit viewport region
03628       // Set global mouse regions
03629       // Define region for viewport
03630       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gViewportRegion, 0, 0 ,gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03631       MSYS_AddRegion( &gViewportRegion );
03632       
03633       // Load interface panels
03634       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
03635 
03636       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03637 
03638       if (iResolution == 0)
03639       {
03640       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\bottom_bar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03641       }
03642       else if (iResolution == 1)
03643       {
03644             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\bottom_bar_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03645       }
03646       else if (iResolution == 2)
03647       {
03648             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\bottom_bar_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03649       }
03650 
03651       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiTEAMPanel ) );
03652 
03653       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03654       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\gold_front.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03655       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiTEAMObjects ) );
03656 
03657       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03658       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Bars.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03659       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel ) );
03660 
03661       // Clear inv display stuff
03662       memset( gfTEAM_HandInvDispText, 0, sizeof( gfTEAM_HandInvDispText ) );
03663 
03664 
03665       // Create buttons
03666       CHECKF( CreateTEAMPanelButtons( ) );
03667 
03668       // Set viewports
03669       // Define region for panel
03670       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_PanelRegion, 0, gsVIEWPORT_END_Y ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03671                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
03672       // Add region
03673       MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_PanelRegion);
03674 
03675       for ( posIndex = 0, cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++, posIndex +=2 )
03676       {
03677             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] ,(INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + TM_FACE_WIDTH ), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03678                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MercFacePanelMoveCallback, MercFacePanelCallback ); 
03679             // Add region
03680             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ] );
03681             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03682 
03683 
03684             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ], (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + 1), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + 1 ) ,(INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + INDICATOR_BOX_WIDTH ), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + INDICATOR_BOX_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03685                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, EnemyIndicatorClickCallback ); 
03686             // Add region
03687             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ] );
03688             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03689 
03690 
03691 
03692             if ( IsMouseInRegion( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ] ) )
03693             {
03694                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID != NOBODY )
03695                   {
03696                         HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ], TRUE );
03697                   }
03698             }
03699 
03700 
03701             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ], sTEAMBarsXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMBarsXY[ posIndex + 1 ] ,(INT16)(sTEAMBarsXY[ posIndex ] + TM_BARS_REGION_WIDTH ), (INT16)(sTEAMBarsXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_BARS_REGION_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03702                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MercFacePanelCallback ); 
03703             // Add region
03704             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ] );
03705             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03706 
03707             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_LeftBarsRegions[ cnt ], (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] - 8 ), sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] ,(INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] ), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_BARS_REGION_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03708                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MercFacePanelCallback ); 
03709             // Add region
03710             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_LeftBarsRegions[ cnt ] );
03711             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_LeftBarsRegions[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03712 
03713 
03714             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ], sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex + 1 ], (INT16)(sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex ] + TM_INV_WIDTH ) ,(INT16)(sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_INV_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03715                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, TMClickFirstHandInvCallback ); 
03716             // Add region
03717             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ] );
03718 
03719             // Add user data
03720             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03721 
03722 
03723 
03724             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ], sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex ], (INT16)( sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + 24 ), (INT16)(sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex ] + TM_INV_WIDTH) ,(INT16)(sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_INV_HEIGHT + 24 ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03725                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, TMClickSecondHandInvCallback ); 
03726             // Add region
03727             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ] );
03728 
03729             // Add user data
03730             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
03731             
03732       }
03733 
03734 
03735       //DEfine region for selected guy panel
03736       //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanalRegion, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y, SM_SELMERC_FACE_X + SM_SELMERC_FACE_WIDTH, SM_SELMERC_FACE_Y + SM_SELMERC_FACE_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
03737       //                             CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectedMercButtonCallback ); 
03738       // Add region
03739       //MSYS_AddRegion( &gSM_SELMERCPanalRegion );
03740 
03741       return( TRUE );
03742 }
03743 
03744 BOOLEAN ShutdownTEAMPanel( )
03745 {
03746       UINT32                              cnt;
03747 
03748       // All buttons and regions and video objects and video surfaces will be deleted at shutddown of SGM
03749       // We may want to delete them at the interm as well, to free up room for other panels
03750       // Delete video objects!
03751       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiTEAMPanel );
03752       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiTEAMObjects );
03753       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel );
03754 
03755 
03756       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_PanelRegion);
03757 
03758       // Remove viewport
03759       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gViewportRegion );
03760 
03761       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
03762       {
03763             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ] );
03764             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ] );
03765             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ] );
03766             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_LeftBarsRegions[ cnt ] );
03767             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ] );
03768             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ] );
03769 
03770             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID != NOBODY )
03771             {
03772                   HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ], FALSE );
03773             }
03774 
03775       }
03776 
03777       // Remove buttons
03778       RemoveTEAMPanelButtons( );
03779 
03780       // turn off the display of the squad list
03781       if( fRenderRadarScreen == FALSE )
03782       {
03783             // start rendering radar region again, 
03784         fRenderRadarScreen = TRUE;
03785 
03786             // remove squad panel
03787             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForSquadList( );
03788       }
03789       return( TRUE );
03790 }
03791 
03792 
03793 void RenderTEAMPanel( BOOLEAN fDirty )
03794 {
03795       INT16 sFontX, sFontY;
03796       UINT32                        cnt, posIndex;
03797       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
03798       static                        INT16       pStr[ 200 ], pMoraleStr[ 20 ];
03799 
03800       // WANNE 2 <new>
03801       if ( fDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
03802       {
03803             MarkAButtonDirty( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] );  
03804             MarkAButtonDirty( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );  
03805             MarkAButtonDirty( iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] );     
03806 
03807 
03808             // Blit video surface
03809             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMPanel, 0, INTERFACE_START_X, INTERFACE_START_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03810             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( INTERFACE_START_X, INTERFACE_START_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH - INTERFACE_START_X , INTERFACE_HEIGHT );
03811             
03812             // WANNE 2 <new> <begin>
03813             // LOOP THROUGH ALL MERCS ON TEAM PANEL
03814             for ( cnt = 0, posIndex = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++, posIndex+= 2 )
03815             {
03816                   // GET SOLDIER
03817                   if ( !gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied )
03818                   {
03819                         //BLIT CLOSE PANEL
03820                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiCLOSE, 5, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ],  VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03821                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
03822 
03823                         // BLIT AP CLOSE PANEL
03824                         //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 3, sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex + 1 ], VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03825                         //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex ]), (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex + 1 ]), TM_APPANEL_WIDTH, TM_APPANEL_HEIGHT );
03826                         //InvalidateRegion( (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex ]), (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex + 1 ]), (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex ] + TM_APPANEL_WIDTH), (INT16)(sTEAMAPPanelXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_APPANEL_HEIGHT ) );
03827 
03828                         if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != OUR_TEAM || INTERRUPT_QUEUED )
03829                         {
03830                               // Hatch out...
03831                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 1, sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03832                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_FACEHIGHTL_WIDTH, TM_FACEHIGHTL_HEIGHT );                               
03833                         }
03834 
03835                   }
03836                   else
03837                   {
03838                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ];
03839 
03840                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
03841                         {
03842                               // Get soldier pointer for vehicle.....
03843                               SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle;
03844 
03845                               pVehicle = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( pSoldier->iVehicleId );
03846 
03847                               //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
03848                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ DRIVER_POPUPTEXT ], pVehicle->bLife, pVehicle->bLifeMax, pVehicle->bBreath, pVehicle->bBreathMax );
03849                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ]), pStr );                              
03850                         }
03851                         // Add text for first hand popup
03852                         else
03853                         {
03854                               GetHelpTextForItem( pStr, &( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), pSoldier );
03855 
03856                               //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
03857                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ]), pStr );
03858                         }
03859 
03860                         // Add text for seonc hand popup
03861                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
03862                         {
03863                               //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
03864                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ]), TacticalStr[ EXIT_VEHICLE_POPUPTEXT ] );                          
03865                         }
03866                         else
03867                         {
03868                               GetHelpTextForItem( pStr, &( pSoldier->inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ]  ), pSoldier );
03869 
03870                               //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
03871                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ]), pStr );
03872                         }
03873 
03874 
03875                         // Render Selected guy if selected
03876                         if ( gusSelectedSoldier == pSoldier->ubID && gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == OUR_TEAM && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pSoldier ) )
03877                         {
03878                               //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
03879                               //{
03880                                     BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 0, sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03881                                     RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_FACEHIGHTL_WIDTH, TM_FACEHIGHTL_HEIGHT );                               
03882 
03883                                     // Render faceplate
03884                                     //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 1, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_X, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03885                                     //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_X), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_Y ), TM_FACEPLATE_WIDTH, TM_FACEPLATE_HEIGHT );
03886                               //}
03887                         }
03888                         else if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != OUR_TEAM || !OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pSoldier ) )
03889                         {
03890                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 1, sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03891                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_FACEHIGHTL_WIDTH, TM_FACEHIGHTL_HEIGHT );                               
03892                                     // Render non-selection
03893                                     //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 4, sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03894                                     //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFaceHighlXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_FACEHIGHTL_WIDTH, TM_FACEHIGHTL_HEIGHT );                                   
03895 
03896                                     // Render faceplate
03897                                     //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiTEAMObjects, 1, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_X, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03898                                     //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_X), (INT16)(sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] + TM_FACEPLATE_OFFSET_Y ), TM_FACEPLATE_WIDTH, TM_FACEPLATE_HEIGHT );
03899 
03900 
03901                         }
03902 
03903                         CheckForFacePanelStartAnims( pSoldier, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] );
03904 
03905                         RenderSoldierFace( pSoldier, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TRUE );
03906 
03907                         // Restore AP/LIFE POSIITONS
03908 
03909                         // Render name!
03910                         SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03911 
03912                         if ( pSoldier->bStealthMode )
03913                         {
03914                               SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
03915                               SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                                                
03916                         }
03917                         else
03918                         {
03919                               SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
03920                               SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGRAY );
03921                         }
03922 
03923                         // RENDER ON SAVE BUFFER!
03924                         SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
03925                         VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( (INT16)(sTEAMNamesXY[ posIndex ] + 2 ), (INT16)(sTEAMNamesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] ), TM_NAME_WIDTH, TM_NAME_HEIGHT, BLOCKFONT2, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", pSoldier->name );
03926                         mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", pSoldier->name );
03927                         gprintfRestore( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", pSoldier->name );
03928                         // reset to frame buffer!
03929                         SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
03930 
03931                   }
03932             }
03933 
03934       }
03935 
03936       // Loop through all mercs and make go
03937       for ( cnt = 0, posIndex = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++, posIndex+= 2 )
03938       {
03939             // GET SOLDIER
03940             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied )
03941             {
03942                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ];
03943 
03944                   // Update animations....
03945                   if ( pSoldier->fClosePanel || pSoldier->fClosePanelToDie )
03946                   {
03947                         pSoldier->sPanelFaceX = gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].usFaceX;
03948                         pSoldier->sPanelFaceY = gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].usFaceY;
03949                   }
03950 
03951 
03952                   if ( fDirty != DIRTYLEVEL0 )
03953                   {
03954                         // UPdate stats!
03955         if ( fDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
03956         {
03957                           if ( pSoldier->bLife != 0 )
03958                           {
03959             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
03960             {
03961                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ VEHICLE_VITAL_STATS_POPUPTEXT ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax, pSoldier->bBreath, pSoldier->bBreathMax );
03962                           SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ]), pStr );
03963             }
03964             else if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
03965             {
03966                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, gzLateLocalizedString[ 16 ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax );
03967                           SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ]), pStr );
03968             }
03969             else
03970             {
03971                                   GetMoraleString( pSoldier, (STR16)pMoraleStr );
03972                                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ MERC_VITAL_STATS_POPUPTEXT ], pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax, pSoldier->bBreath, pSoldier->bBreathMax, pMoraleStr );
03973                                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ]), pStr );
03974             }
03975                           }
03976                           else
03977                           {
03978                                 SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gTEAM_BarsRegions[ cnt ]), L"" );
03979                           }
03980         }
03981 
03982                         if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
03983                         {
03984                               DrawLifeUIBarEx( pSoldier, sTEAMLifeXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMLifeXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_LIFEBAR_WIDTH, TM_LIFEBAR_HEIGHT, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
03985 
03986           if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT ) )
03987           {
03988                                 DrawBreathUIBarEx( pSoldier, sTEAMBreathXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMBreathXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_LIFEBAR_WIDTH, TM_LIFEBAR_HEIGHT, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
03989                                 DrawMoraleUIBarEx( pSoldier, sTEAMMoraleXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMMoraleXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_LIFEBAR_WIDTH, TM_LIFEBAR_HEIGHT, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
03990           }
03991 
03992                               if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
03993                               {
03994                                     // Render APs
03995                                     SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
03996 
03997                                     //if ( pSoldier->sLastTarget != NOWHERE && !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sLastTarget, TRUE ), 0, FALSE ) || GetUIApsToDisplay( pSoldier ) < 0 )
03998                                     if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sLastTarget, TRUE ), 0, FALSE ) || GetUIApsToDisplay( pSoldier ) < 0 )
03999                                     {
04000                                           SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
04001                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED );
04002                                     }
04003                                     else
04004                                     {
04005                                           if ( MercUnderTheInfluence( pSoldier ) )
04006                                           {
04007                                                 SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
04008                                                 SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTBLUE );
04009                                           }
04010                                           else if ( pSoldier->bStealthMode )
04011                                           {
04012                                                 SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
04013                                                 SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                                                
04014                                           }
04015                                           else
04016                                           {
04017                                                 SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
04018                                                 SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGRAY );
04019                                           }
04020                                     }
04021                                     RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMApXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMApXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_AP_WIDTH, TM_AP_HEIGHT );
04022 
04023                                     if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
04024                                     {
04025                                           VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sTEAMApXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMApXY[ posIndex + 1], TM_AP_WIDTH, TM_AP_HEIGHT, TINYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%d", GetUIApsToDisplay( pSoldier ) );
04026                                           mprintf( sFontX, sTEAMApXY[ posIndex + 1], L"%d", GetUIApsToDisplay( pSoldier ) );
04027                                     }
04028                               }
04029                         }
04030                         else
04031                         {
04032                               //Erase!
04033                               //DrawUIBar( pSoldier->bBreath, sTEAMBreathXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMBreathXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_LIFEBAR_WIDTH, TM_LIFEBAR_HEIGHT, DRAW_ERASE_BAR );
04034                               //DrawUIBar( pSoldier->bLife, sTEAMLifeXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMLifeXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_LIFEBAR_WIDTH, TM_LIFEBAR_HEIGHT, DRAW_ERASE_BAR );
04035 
04036                               // Erase APs
04037                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sTEAMApXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMApXY[ posIndex + 1 ], TM_AP_WIDTH, TM_AP_HEIGHT );
04038 
04039                         }
04040 
04041                   }
04042 
04043                   RenderSoldierTeamInv( pSoldier, sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMHandInvXY[ posIndex + 1 ], (UINT8)cnt, fDirty );
04044 
04045                   HandleSoldierFaceFlash( pSoldier, sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex ], sTEAMFacesXY[ posIndex + 1 ] );
04046 
04047 
04048                   if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
04049                   {
04050                         //HandlePanelFaceAnimations( pSoldier );
04051                   }
04052 
04053             }
04054       }
04055       
04056       UpdateTEAMPanel( );
04057       
04058       if( fRenderRadarScreen == TRUE )
04059       {
04060             // Render clock
04061             RenderClock( INTERFACE_CLOCK_X, INTERFACE_CLOCK_Y );
04062             CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( INTERFACE_CLOCK_X, INTERFACE_CLOCK_Y );
04063             RenderTownIDString( );
04064       }
04065       else
04066       {
04067             RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( );
04068       }
04069 }
04070 
04071 BOOLEAN CreateTEAMPanelButtons( )
04072 {
04073 UINT8 ubString[48];
04074 
04075       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\bottom_bar_buttons.sti", (STR)ubString);
04076 
04077       // Load button Graphics
04078       iTEAMPanelImages[ ENDTURN_IMAGES  ]             = LoadButtonImage(ubString,-1,0,-1, 3,-1 );
04079       iTEAMPanelImages[ ROSTERMODE_IMAGES  ]    = UseLoadedButtonImage( iTEAMPanelImages[ ENDTURN_IMAGES  ] ,-1, 1,-1, 4,-1 );
04080       iTEAMPanelImages[ DISK_IMAGES  ]                      = UseLoadedButtonImage( iTEAMPanelImages[ ENDTURN_IMAGES  ] ,-1, 2,-1, 5, -1 );
04081       
04082       // Create buttons
04083       iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] = QuickCreateButton( iTEAMPanelImages[ ENDTURN_IMAGES ], TM_ENDTURN_X, TM_ENDTURN_Y,
04084                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1,
04085                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnEndTurnCallback );
04086       if ( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] == -1 )
04087       {
04088             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Cannot create Interface button" );
04089             return( FALSE );
04090       }
04091       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ], TacticalStr[ END_TURN_POPUPTEXT ] );
04092 
04093 
04094 
04095       iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] = QuickCreateButton( iTEAMPanelImages[ ROSTERMODE_IMAGES ], TM_ROSTERMODE_X, TM_ROSTERMODE_Y,
04096                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1,
04097                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnRostermodeCallback );
04098       if ( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] == -1 )
04099       {
04100             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Cannot create Interface button" );
04101             return( FALSE );
04102       }
04103       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ], TacticalStr[ MAPSCREEN_POPUPTEXT ] );
04104 
04105       iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] = QuickCreateButton( iTEAMPanelImages[ DISK_IMAGES ], TM_DISK_X, TM_DISK_Y,
04106                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1,
04107                                                             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnSquadCallback );
04108       if ( iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] == -1 )
04109       {
04110             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Cannot create Interface button" );
04111             return( FALSE );
04112       }
04113       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ], TacticalStr[ CHANGE_SQUAD_POPUPTEXT ] );
04114 
04115       return( TRUE );
04116 }
04117 
04118 void    RemoveTEAMPanelButtons( )
04119 {
04120       UINT32 cnt;
04121 
04122       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_BUTTONS; cnt++ )
04123       {
04124             RemoveButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ cnt ] );
04125       }
04126 
04127       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_BUTTON_IMAGES; cnt++ )
04128       {
04129             UnloadButtonImage( iTEAMPanelImages[ cnt ] );
04130       }
04131 
04132 }
04133 
04134 void BtnEndTurnCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04135 {
04136       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04137       {
04138             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
04139       }
04140       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04141       {
04142             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
04143 
04144             // END TURN
04145             UIHandleEndTurn( NULL );
04146 
04147       }
04148       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04149       {
04150             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
04151       }
04152       
04153 }
04154 
04155 void BtnRostermodeCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04156 {
04157       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04158       {
04159             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
04160       }
04161       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04162       {
04163             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
04164 
04165             if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
04166             {
04167                   GoToMapScreenFromTactical();
04168                   EnableRadarScreenRender( );
04169             }
04170 
04171       }
04172       
04173 }
04174 
04175 
04176 // callback to handle squad switching callback
04177 void BtnSquadCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04178 {
04179       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04180       {
04181             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
04182       }
04183       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04184       {
04185             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
04186 
04187             // ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Not Implemented Yet" );
04188             ToggleRadarScreenRender( );
04189 
04190       }
04191       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04192       {
04193             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
04194       }
04195       
04196 }
