04198 void SetTEAMPanelCurrentMerc( UINT8 ubNewID )
04199 {
04200       // Ignore ther ID given!
04201       // ALWYAS USE CURRENT MERC!
04202 
04203       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04204 
04205       UpdateTEAMPanel( );
04206 
04207 }
04208 
04209 void UpdateTEAMPanel( )
04210 {
04211       INT32       cnt;
04212 
04213       if ( (gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum) || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04214       {
04215             DisableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
04216       }
04217       else
04218       {
04219             EnableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
04220       }
04221 
04222       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )
04223       {
04224             DisableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
04225       }
04226       else
04227       {
04228             EnableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
04229       }
04230 
04231 
04232       if ( gfDisableTacticalPanelButtons )
04233       {
04234             DisableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_DONE_BUTTON ] );
04235             DisableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ TEAM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
04236             DisableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] );
04237 
04238             // OK, disable item regions.......
04239             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
04240             {
04241                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ] );
04242 
04243                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ] );
04244 
04245                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ] );                
04246             }
04247 
04248             //disable the radar map region
04249             // If NOT in overhead map
04250             if ( !InOverheadMap( ) )
04251             {
04252                   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
04253             }
04254 
04255       }
04256       else
04257       {
04258             EnableButton( iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] );
04259 
04260             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
04261             {
04262                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTEAM_EnemyIndicator[ cnt ] );
04263 
04264                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ] );
04265 
04266                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTEAM_SecondHandInv[ cnt ] );                 
04267             }
04268 
04269             //Enable the radar map region
04270             MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
04271 
04272       }
04273 
04274 
04275 }
04276 
04277 
04278 void HandleMouseOverTeamFaceForContMove( BOOLEAN fOn )
04279 {
04280       FACETYPE *pFace;
04281 
04282       if ( fOn )
04283       {
04284             // Check if we are waiting to continue move...
04285             if ( CheckForMercContMove( gpSMCurrentMerc ) )
04286             {
04287                   // Display 'cont' on face....
04288                   // Get face
04289                   pFace = &gFacesData[ gpSMCurrentMerc->iFaceIndex ];
04290                   
04291                   pFace->fDisplayTextOver = FACE_DRAW_TEXT_OVER;
04292                   wcscpy( pFace->zDisplayText, TacticalStr[ CONTINUE_OVER_FACE_STR ] );
04293 
04294                   // While our mouse is here, draw a path!
04295                   PlotPath( gpSMCurrentMerc, gpSMCurrentMerc->sFinalDestination, NO_COPYROUTE, PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)gpSMCurrentMerc->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, gpSMCurrentMerc->bActionPoints );
04296             }
04297       }
04298       else
04299       {
04300             // Remove 'cont' on face....
04301             // Get face
04302             pFace = &gFacesData[ gpSMCurrentMerc->iFaceIndex ];
04303             
04304             pFace->fDisplayTextOver = FACE_ERASE_TEXT_OVER;
04305 
04306             // Erase path!
04307             ErasePath( TRUE );
04308       }
04309 }
04310 
04311 
04312 void MercFacePanelMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04313 {
04314       UINT8 ubID, ubSoldierID;
04315       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04316 
04317       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04318 
04319       // If our flags are set to do this, gofoit!
04320       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
04321       {
04322             return;
04323       }
04324 
04325       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
04326       {
04327             return;
04328       }
04329 
04330       // Now use soldier ID values
04331       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
04332 
04333       if ( ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
04334       {
04335             return;
04336       }
04337 
04338       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
04339 
04340       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
04341       {
04342             return;
04343       }
04344 
04345 
04346       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
04347       {
04348             HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
04349       }
04350       else if ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04351       {
04352             HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
04353       }
04354 
04355 }
04356 
04357 
04358 void EnemyIndicatorClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04359 {
04360       UINT8 ubID, ubSoldierID;
04361 
04362       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04363 
04364       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
04365       {
04366             return;
04367       }
04368 
04369       // Now use soldier ID values
04370       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
04371 
04372       if ( ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
04373       {
04374             return;
04375       }
04376 
04377 
04378       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04379       {
04380             return;
04381       }
04382 
04383       if ( !MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->bActive )
04384       {
04385             return;
04386       }
04387 
04388 
04389       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
04390       {
04391             if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) )
04392             {
04393             }
04394             else
04395             {
04396                   SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04397 
04398                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
04399 
04400                   if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
04401                   {     // Cycle....
04402                         CycleVisibleEnemies( pSoldier );
04403                   }
04404                   else
04405                   {
04406                         MercFacePanelCallback( pRegion, iReason );
04407                   }
04408             }
04409       }
04410 }
04411 
04412 
04413 void MercFacePanelCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04414 {
04415       UINT8 ubID, ubSoldierID;
04416       SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle;
04417 
04418       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04419 
04420       // If our flags are set to do this, gofoit!
04421       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
04422       {
04423             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
04424             {
04425                   SetInfoChar( ubID );
04426             }
04427             return;
04428       }
04429 
04430       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
04431       {
04432             return;
04433       }
04434 
04435 
04436       // Now use soldier ID values
04437       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
04438 
04439       if ( ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
04440       {
04441             return;
04442       }
04443 
04444 
04445       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04446       {
04447             return;
04448       }
04449 
04450       if ( !MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->bActive )
04451       {
04452             return;
04453       }
04454 
04455 
04456       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
04457       {
04458             if ( !gfInItemPickupMenu && gpItemPointer == NULL )
04459             {
04460                   if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) )
04461                   {
04462                         pVehicle = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->iVehicleId );
04463 
04464                         HandleLocateSelectMerc( pVehicle->ubID, 0 );
04465                   }
04466                   else
04467                   {
04468                         if ( !InOverheadMap( ) )
04469                         {
04470                               // If we can continue a move, do so!
04471                               if ( CheckForMercContMove( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] ) )
04472                               {
04473                                     // Continue
04474                                     ContinueMercMovement( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
04475                                     ErasePath( TRUE );
04476                               }
04477                               else
04478                               {
04479                                     HandleLocateSelectMerc( ubSoldierID, 0 );
04480                               }
04481                         }
04482                         else
04483                         {
04484                               SelectSoldier( ubSoldierID, TRUE, FALSE );
04485                         }
04486                   }
04487             }
04488       }
04489       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
04490       {
04491             if ( !InOverheadMap( ) )
04492             {
04493                   // Only if guy is not dead!
04494                   if ( !( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) && !AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] ) && !( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
04495                   {
04496                         gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
04497                         gbNewPanel = SM_PANEL;
04498                         gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)ubSoldierID;
04499                   }
04500             }
04501       }
04502 
04503 }
04504 
04505 extern void InternalSelectSoldier( UINT16 usSoldierID, BOOLEAN fAcknowledge, BOOLEAN fForceReselect, BOOLEAN fFromUI );
04506 
04507 void HandleLocateSelectMerc( UINT8 ubID, INT8 bFlag  )
04508 {
04509       BOOLEAN fSelect = FALSE;
04510 
04511       if( !MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bActive )
04512       {
04513             return;
04514       }
04515 
04516       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
04517       {
04518             // ATE: Disable for feel purposes....
04519             //return;
04520       }
04521 
04522 
04523       // ATE: No matter what we do... if below OKLIFE, just locate....
04524       if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bLife < OKLIFE )
04525       {
04526             LocateSoldier( ubID, SETLOCATOR );
04527             return;
04528       }
04529 
04530       if ( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
04531       {
04532             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_OLD_SELECTION_METHOD ] )
04533             {
04534                   // Select merc
04535                   InternalSelectSoldier( ubID, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE);
04536                   MercPtrs[ ubID ]->fFlashLocator = FALSE;
04537                   ResetMultiSelection( );
04538             }
04539             else
04540             {
04541                   // Just locate....
04542                   LocateSoldier( ubID, SETLOCATOR );
04543             }
04544       }
04545       else
04546       {
04547             if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->fFlashLocator == FALSE )
04548             {
04549                   if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_OLD_SELECTION_METHOD ] )
04550                   {
04551                         // If we are currently selected, slide to location
04552                         if ( ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
04553                         {
04554                               SlideTo( NOWHERE, gusSelectedSoldier, NOBODY ,SETLOCATOR);
04555                         }
04556                         else
04557                         {
04558                               LocateSoldier( ubID, SETLOCATOR );
04559                         }
04560                   }
04561                   else
04562                   {
04563                         if ( ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
04564                         {
04565                               SlideTo( NOWHERE, gusSelectedSoldier, NOBODY ,SETLOCATOR );
04566                         }
04567                         else
04568                         {
04569                               fSelect = TRUE;
04570                               //ShowRadioLocator( ubID, SHOW_LOCATOR_NORMAL );
04571                         }
04572                   }
04573             }
04574             else 
04575             {
04576                   if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_OLD_SELECTION_METHOD ] )
04577                   {
04578                         // If we are currently selected, slide to location
04579                         if ( ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
04580                         {
04581                               SlideTo( NOWHERE, gusSelectedSoldier, NOBODY ,DONTSETLOCATOR);
04582                         }
04583                         else
04584                         {
04585                               LocateSoldier( ubID, DONTSETLOCATOR );
04586                         }
04587 
04588                         fSelect = TRUE;
04589                   }
04590                   else
04591                   {
04592                         if ( ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
04593                         {
04594                               LocateSoldier( ubID, DONTSETLOCATOR );
04595                         }
04596                         else
04597                         {
04598                               fSelect = TRUE;
04599                         }
04600                   }
04601             }
04602 
04603             if ( bFlag == LOCATEANDSELECT_MERC )
04604             {
04605                   fSelect = TRUE;
04606             }
04607 
04608             if ( fSelect )
04609             {
04610                   // Select merc, only if alive!
04611                   if ( !( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
04612                   {
04613                         InternalSelectSoldier( ubID, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE );
04614                   }
04615             }
04616       }
04617 
04618       ResetMultiSelection( );
04619 
04620       // Handle locate select merc....
04621       HandleMouseOverSoldierFaceForContMove( MercPtrs[ ubID ], TRUE );
04622 
04623 }
04624

04627 void ShowRadioLocator( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubLocatorSpeed )
04628 {
04629       RESETTIMECOUNTER( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->FlashSelCounter, FLASH_SELECTOR_DELAY );
04630 
04631       //LocateSoldier( ubID, FALSE );     // IC - this is already being done outside of this function :)
04632       MercPtrs[ ubID ]->fFlashLocator = TRUE;
04633       //gbPanelSelectedGuy = ubID;  IC - had to move this outside to make this function versatile
04634       MercPtrs[ ubID ]->sLocatorFrame = 0;
04635 
04636       if ( ubLocatorSpeed == SHOW_LOCATOR_NORMAL )
04637       {
04638             // If we are an AI guy, and we have the baton, make lower...
04639             // ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL && MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
04640             //
04641             //ercPtrs[ ubID ]->ubNumLocateCycles = 3;
04642             //
04643             //se
04644             //
04645                   MercPtrs[ ubID ]->ubNumLocateCycles = 5;
04646             //
04647       }
04648       else
04649       {
04650             MercPtrs[ ubID ]->ubNumLocateCycles = 3;
04651       }
04652 }

04662 void CheckForFacePanelStartAnims( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sPanelX, INT16 sPanelY )
04663 {
04664 
04665       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
04666       {
04667             return;
04668       }
04669 
04670 
04671       if ( pSoldier->fUIdeadMerc  )
04672       {
04673 //          pSoldier->sPanelFaceX   = sPanelX;
04674 //          pSoldier->sPanelFaceY   = sPanelY;
04675       }

04680 
04681 void FinishAnySkullPanelAnimations( )
04682 {
04683       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
04684       INT32       cnt2;
04685 
04686       cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;  
04687 
04688       // run through list
04689       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]; cnt2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt2++,pTeamSoldier++ )
04690       {
04691             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bLife == 0 )
04692             {
04693                   if ( pTeamSoldier->fUIdeadMerc || pTeamSoldier->fClosePanelToDie )
04694                   {
04695                         HandlePlayerTeamMemberDeathAfterSkullAnimation( pTeamSoldier );
04696                         
04697                         pTeamSoldier->fUIdeadMerc = FALSE;
04698                         pTeamSoldier->fClosePanelToDie = FALSE;
04699                   }
04700             }
04701       }
04702 
04703 }
04704 
04705 void HandlePanelFaceAnimations( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04706 {
04707       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
04708       {
04709             return;
04710       }
04711 
04712 
04713       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
04714       {
04715             return;
04716       }
04717 
04718       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
04719       {
04720             // Don't do this for a vehice.
04721             return;
04722       }
04723 
04724       // If this is the first time we are active, open panel!
04725       if ( pSoldier->fUInewMerc )
04726       {
04727             pSoldier->fUInewMerc = FALSE;
04728       }
04729 
04730       if ( pSoldier->fUICloseMerc )
04731       {
04732             pSoldier->fUICloseMerc = FALSE;
04733       }
04734 
04735       if ( pSoldier->fUIdeadMerc  )
04736       {
04737             pSoldier->sPanelFaceX = gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].usFaceX;
04738             pSoldier->sPanelFaceY = gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].usFaceY;
04739 
04740             pSoldier->fUIdeadMerc = FALSE;            
04741             pSoldier->fClosePanel         = TRUE;
04742             pSoldier->fClosePanelToDie = TRUE;
04743             pSoldier->ubClosePanelFrame = 0;
04744             pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame = 0;
04745             RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 );
04746       }
04747 
04748       if ( pSoldier->fClosePanel )
04749       {
04750              if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 ) )
04751              {
04752                         pSoldier->ubClosePanelFrame++;
04753 
04754                         if ( pSoldier->ubClosePanelFrame > 5 )
04755                         {
04756                               pSoldier->fClosePanel = FALSE;
04757                               pSoldier->ubClosePanelFrame = 5;
04758 
04759                               if ( pSoldier->fClosePanelToDie )
04760                               {
04761                                     pSoldier->fDeadPanel = TRUE;
04762                                     //PlayJA2Sample( (UINT8)HEADCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04763                               }
04764                               else
04765                               {
04766                                     if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04767                                     {
04768                                           RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
04769                                     }
04770                               }
04771                         }
04772                         RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 );
04773              }
04774       }
04775 
04776       if ( pSoldier->fClosePanel )
04777       {
04778              // Render panel!
04779              //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
04780              //{
04781                   if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04782                   {
04783                          RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
04784                          BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiCLOSE, pSoldier->ubClosePanelFrame, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04785                          InvalidateRegion( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX + TM_FACE_WIDTH, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY + TM_FACE_HEIGHT );                  
04786                   }
04787              //}
04788       }
04789 
04790 
04791       if ( pSoldier->fDeadPanel )
04792       {
04793              if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE(  pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 ) )
04794              {
04795                         pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame++;
04796 
04797                         if ( pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame == 4 )
04798                         {
04799                               ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_SKULL_UI_FEEDBACK, pMercDeadString[ 0 ], pSoldier->name );
04800 
04801                               PlayJA2Sample( (UINT8)DOORCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04802                               PlayJA2Sample( (UINT8)HEADCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04803                         }
04804 
04805                         if ( pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame > 5 )
04806                         {
04807                               pSoldier->fDeadPanel = FALSE;
04808                               pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame = 5;
04809                               pSoldier->fClosePanelToDie = FALSE;
04810 
04811                               // Finish!
04812                               if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04813                               {
04814                                     BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiDEAD, pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04815 
04816                                     // Blit hatch!
04817                                     BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiHATCH, 0, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04818 
04819                                     RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
04820                               }
04821                               HandlePlayerTeamMemberDeathAfterSkullAnimation( pSoldier );
04822 
04823                         }
04824                         RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 );
04825              }
04826       }
04827 
04828       if ( pSoldier->fDeadPanel )
04829       {
04830              // Render panel!
04831              //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
04832              //{
04833                         if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04834                         {
04835                                BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiDEAD, pSoldier->ubDeadPanelFrame, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04836 
04837                                // Blit hatch!
04838                                BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiHATCH, 0, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04839 
04840                                InvalidateRegion( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX + TM_FACE_WIDTH, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY + TM_FACE_HEIGHT );                  
04841                         }
04842              //}
04843       }
04844 
04845 
04846       if ( pSoldier->fOpenPanel )
04847       {
04848              if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 ) )
04849              {
04850                         pSoldier->bOpenPanelFrame--;
04851 
04852                         if ( pSoldier->bOpenPanelFrame < 0 )
04853                         {
04854                               pSoldier->fOpenPanel = FALSE;
04855                               pSoldier->bOpenPanelFrame = 0;
04856 
04857                               if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04858                               {
04859                                     RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
04860                               }
04861                         }
04862                         RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PanelAnimateCounter, 160 );
04863              }
04864       }
04865 
04866       if ( pSoldier->fOpenPanel )
04867       {
04868              // Render panel!
04869              //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
04870              //{
04871                         if ( !gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
04872                         {
04873                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, TM_FACE_WIDTH, TM_FACE_HEIGHT );
04874                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiCLOSE, pSoldier->bOpenPanelFrame, pSoldier->sPanelFaceX, pSoldier->sPanelFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04875                               //InvalidateRegion( sTEAMFacesXY[ ubOpenPanelID ], sTEAMFacesXY[ ubOpenPanelID + 1 ], sTEAMFacesXY[ ubOpenPanelID ] + TM_FACE_WIDTH, sTEAMFacesXY[ ubOpenPanelID + 1 ] + TM_FACE_HEIGHT );                   
04876                         }
04877              //}
04878       }
04879       
04880 }

04890 
04891 void RenderSoldierTeamInv( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, UINT8 ubPanelNum, BOOLEAN fDirty )
04892 {
04893       if ( pSoldier->bActive && !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
04894       {
04895             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DRIVER )
04896             {
04897                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiVEHINV, 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04898                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sX, sY, (INT16)( TM_INV_WIDTH ) , (INT16)( TM_INV_HEIGHT ) );
04899             }
04900             else
04901             {
04902                   // Look in primary hand
04903                   INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]), sX, sY, TM_INV_WIDTH, TM_INV_HEIGHT, fDirty, &(gfTEAM_HandInvDispText[ ubPanelNum ][ HANDPOS ] ), 0 , FALSE, 0);
04904             }
04905 
04906             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
04907             {
04908                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiVEHINV, 1, sX, (INT16)(sY + TM_INV_HAND_SEPY), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
04909                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sX, (INT16)(sY + TM_INV_HAND_SEPY), (INT16)(TM_INV_WIDTH ) , (INT16)( TM_INV_HEIGHT ) );
04910             }
04911             else
04912             {
04913                   // Do secondary hand
04914                   INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ]), sX, (INT16)(sY + TM_INV_HAND_SEPY), TM_INV_WIDTH, TM_INV_HEIGHT, fDirty, &(gfTEAM_HandInvDispText[ ubPanelNum ][ SECONDHANDPOS ] ), 0 , FALSE, 0);
04915             }
04916 
04917       }
04918 }

04920 
04921 void TMFirstHandInvCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04922 {
04923       UINT8 ubID, ubSoldierID;
04924 
04925       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04926 
04927       // If our flags are set to do this, gofoit!
04928       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
04929       {
04930             return;
04931       }
04932 
04933       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04934       {
04935             return;
04936       }
04937 
04938       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
04939             return;
04940 
04941 
04942       // Now use soldier ID values
04943       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
04944       
04945 
04946       if ( !MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->bActive )
04947       {
04948             return;
04949       }
04950 
04951 
04952       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
04953       {
04954             //OK FOR NOW, DROP ITEM WHERE BUDDY IS
04955             {
04956             //    SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
04957 
04958             //    if(   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, ubSoldierID ) )
04959             //    {
04960             //    }
04961             }
04962       }
04963       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
04964       {
04965 
04966       }
04967 
04968 }
04969 
04970 
04971 void TMClickFirstHandInvCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04972 {
04973       UINT8       ubID, ubSoldierID;
04974       UINT16      usOldHandItem;
04975 
04976       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
04977 
04978 
04979       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
04980             return;
04981       
04982       // Now use soldier ID values
04983       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
04984 
04985       if ( ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
04986             return;
04987 
04988       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04989       {
04990             // Change to use cursor mode...
04991             guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_ON_TERRAIN;
04992       }
04993 
04994       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
04995       {
04996             if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] ) )
04997             {
04998                   usOldHandItem = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
04999                   //SwapOutHandItem( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
05000                   SwapHandItems( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
05001                   ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ], usOldHandItem, MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->inv[HANDPOS].usItem );
05002                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05003             }
05004       }
05005 }
05006 
05007 
05008 void TMClickSecondHandInvCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05009 {
05010       UINT8 ubID, ubSoldierID;
05011       UINT16      usOldHandItem;
05012 
05013       ubID = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
05014 
05015       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
05016             return;
05017       
05018       // Now use soldier ID values
05019       ubSoldierID = gTeamPanel[ ubID ].ubID;
05020 
05021       if ( ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
05022             return;
05023 
05024       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05025       {
05026             if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
05027             {
05028                   ExitVehicle( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
05029             }
05030       }
05031 
05032       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
05033       {
05034             if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
05035             {
05036             }
05037             else
05038             {
05039                   if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] ) )
05040                   {
05041                         usOldHandItem = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
05042                         SwapHandItems( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
05043                         ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ], usOldHandItem, MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->inv[HANDPOS].usItem );
05044                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05045                   }
05046             }
05047       }
05048 }
05049 
05050 
05051 BOOLEAN PlayerExistsInSlot( UINT8 ubID )
05052 {
05053       INT32 cnt;
05054 
05055       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05056       {
05057             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied    )
05058             {
05059                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID == ubID )
05060                   {
05061                         return( TRUE );
05062                   }
05063             }
05064       }
05065 
05066       return( FALSE );
05067 }
05068 
05069 
05070 INT8 GetTeamSlotFromPlayerID( UINT8 ubID )
05071 {
05072       INT8 cnt;
05073 
05074       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05075       {
05076             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied    )
05077             {
05078                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID == ubID )
05079                   {
05080                         return( cnt );
05081                   }
05082             }
05083       }
05084 
05085       return( -1 );
05086 }
05087 
05088 
05089 BOOLEAN RemovePlayerFromTeamSlotGivenMercID( UINT8 ubMercID )
05090 {
05091       INT32 cnt;
05092 
05093       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05094       {
05095             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied    )
05096             {
05097                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID == ubMercID )
05098                   {
05099                         RemovePlayerFromInterfaceTeamSlot( (UINT8)cnt );
05100                         return( TRUE );
05101                   }
05102             }
05103       }
05104 
05105       return( FALSE );
05106 }
05107 
05108 
05109 void AddPlayerToInterfaceTeamSlot( UINT8 ubID )
05110 {
05111       INT32  cnt;
05112 
05113       // If we are a vehicle don't ever add.....
05114       if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05115       {
05116             return;
05117       }
05118 
05119       if ( !PlayerExistsInSlot( ubID ) )
05120       {
05121             // Find a free slot
05122             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05123             {
05124                   if ( !gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied   )
05125                   {
05126                         gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied = TRUE;
05127                         gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID              = ubID;
05128 
05129                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
05130                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
05131 
05132                         // DIRTY INTERFACE
05133                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05134 
05135                         // Set ID to do open anim
05136                         MercPtrs[ ubID ]->fUInewMerc                                = TRUE;
05137 
05138                         break;
05139                   }
05140             }
05141       }
05142 }
05143 
05144 BOOLEAN InitTEAMSlots( )
05145 {
05146       INT32 cnt;
05147 
05148       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05149       {
05150             gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied = FALSE;
05151             gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID              = NOBODY;
05152 
05153       }
05154 
05155       return( TRUE );
05156 }
05157 
05158 
05159 BOOLEAN GetPlayerIDFromInterfaceTeamSlot( UINT8 ubPanelSlot, UINT8 *pubID )
05160 {
05161       if ( ubPanelSlot >= NUM_TEAM_SLOTS )
05162       {
05163             return( FALSE );
05164       }
05165 
05166       if ( gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].fOccupied )
05167       {
05168             *pubID = gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].ubID;
05169             return( TRUE );
05170       }
05171       else
05172       {
05173             return( FALSE );
05174       }
05175 }
05176 
05177 void RemoveAllPlayersFromSlot( )
05178 {
05179       int cnt;
05180       
05181       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05182       {
05183             RemovePlayerFromInterfaceTeamSlot( (UINT8)cnt );
05184       }
05185 }
05186 
05187 
05188 BOOLEAN RemovePlayerFromInterfaceTeamSlot( UINT8 ubPanelSlot )
05189 {
05190       if ( ubPanelSlot >= NUM_TEAM_SLOTS )
05191       {
05192             return( FALSE );
05193       }
05194 
05195       if ( gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].fOccupied )
05196       {
05197             if ( !( MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].ubID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
05198     {
05199               // Set Id to close
05200               MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].ubID ]->fUICloseMerc        = TRUE;
05201     }
05202 
05203             // Set face to inactive...
05204             SetAutoFaceInActive( MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].ubID ]->iFaceIndex );
05205 
05206 
05207             gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].fOccupied = FALSE;
05208             gTeamPanel[ ubPanelSlot ].ubID = NOBODY;
05209 
05210             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FirstHandInv[ ubPanelSlot ], 0, NOBODY );
05211             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTEAM_FaceRegions[ ubPanelSlot ],  0, NOBODY );
05212 
05213             // DIRTY INTERFACE
05214             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05215 
05216             return( TRUE );
05217       }
05218       else
05219       {
05220             return( FALSE );
05221       }
05222 }
05223 
05224 
05225 void RenderTownIDString( )
05226 {
05227       CHAR16      zTownIDString[80];
05228       INT16 sFontX, sFontY;
05229 
05230       // Render town, position
05231       SetFont( COMPFONT );
05232       SetFontForeground( 183 );
05233       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05234 
05235       GetSectorIDString( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, zTownIDString, TRUE );
05236       ReduceStringLength( zTownIDString, 80, COMPFONT );
05237       VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( LOCATION_NAME_X , LOCATION_NAME_Y, 80, 16, COMPFONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, zTownIDString );
05238       mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", zTownIDString );
05239 }
05240 
05241 
05242 void CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05243 {
05244 
05245       if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
05246       {
05247             // Add to interface if the are ours
05248             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
05249             {
05250                   // Are we in the loaded sector?
05251                   if ( pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && pSoldier->bInSector )
05252                   {
05253                         // IF on duty....
05254                         if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment ==  CurrentSquad( ) )|| ( SoldierIsDeadAndWasOnSquad( pSoldier, ( INT8 )( CurrentSquad( ) ) ) ) )
05255                         {
05256 
05257                               if( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD )
05258                               {
05259                                     pSoldier->fUICloseMerc = FALSE;
05260                               }
05261                               // ATE: ALrighty, if we have the insertion code of helicopter..... don't add just yet!
05262                               /// ( will add in heli code )
05263                               if ( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER )
05264                               {
05265                                     AddPlayerToInterfaceTeamSlot( pSoldier->ubID );
05266                               }
05267 
05268                               // ARE WE A VEHICLE.....
05269                               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05270                               {
05271                                     AddPassangersToTeamPanel( pSoldier->bVehicleID );
05272                               }
05273                         }     
05274                   }
05275                   else
05276                   {
05277                         // Make sure we are NOT in this world!
05278                         // Set gridno to one that's not visib;l
05279                         RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
05280 
05281                         // Remove slot from tactical
05282                         RemoveMercSlot( pSoldier );
05283 
05284                   }
05285             }
05286       }
05287 }
05288 
05289 
05290 UINT8 FindNextMercInTeamPanel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fGoodForLessOKLife, BOOLEAN fOnlyRegularMercs )
05291 {
05292       INT32 cnt;
05293       INT32 bFirstID;
05294       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
05295 
05296 
05297       bFirstID = GetTeamSlotFromPlayerID( pSoldier->ubID );
05298 
05299       if ( bFirstID == -1 )
05300       {
05301             return( pSoldier->ubID );
05302       }
05303 
05304       for ( cnt = ( bFirstID + 1 ); cnt < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt++ )
05305       {
05306             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied )
05307             {
05308                   // Set Id to close
05309                   pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ];
05310 
05311                   if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
05312                   {
05313                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) ) )
05314                         {
05315                               continue;
05316                         }
05317                   }
05318 
05319                   if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
05320                   {
05321                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
05322                         {
05323                               return( (UINT8)gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID );
05324                         }
05325                   }
05326                   else
05327                   {
05328                         if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
05329                         {
05330                               return( (UINT8)gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID );
05331                         }
05332                   }
05333             }
05334       }
05335 
05336 
05337       if ( ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER ) && ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPACE_SELECTS_NEXT_SQUAD ] ) )
05338       { 
05339             // only allow if nothing in hand and if in SM panel, the Change Squad button must be enabled
05340             if ( ( ( gsCurInterfacePanel != TEAM_PANEL ) || ( ButtonList[ iTEAMPanelButtons[ CHANGE_SQUAD_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) ) )
05341             {
05342                   SOLDIERTYPE *pNewSoldier;
05343                   INT32       iCurrentSquad;
05344 
05345                   //Select next squad
05346                   iCurrentSquad = CurrentSquad( );
05347 
05348                   pNewSoldier = FindNextActiveSquad( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] );
05349 
05350                   if ( pNewSoldier->bAssignment != iCurrentSquad )
05351                   {
05352                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SQUAD_ACTIVE ], ( CurrentSquad( ) + 1 ) );
05353 
05354                         return( pNewSoldier->ubID );
05355                   }
05356             }
05357       }
05358 
05359       // none found,
05360       // Now loop back
05361       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < bFirstID; cnt++ )
05362       {
05363             if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt ].fOccupied )
05364             {
05365                   pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID ];
05366 
05367                   if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
05368                   {
05369                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) ) )
05370                         {
05371                               continue;
05372                         }
05373                   }
05374 
05375                   if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
05376                   {
05377                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
05378                         {
05379                               return( (UINT8)gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID );
05380                         }
05381                   }
05382                   else
05383                   {
05384                         if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
05385                         {
05386                               return( (UINT8)gTeamPanel[ cnt ].ubID );
05387                         }
05388                   }
05389             }
05390       }
05391 
05392       // IF we are here, keep as we always were!
05393       return( pSoldier->ubID );
05394 }

05401       //To redraw the Store Keeper Interface

05411 
05412 void BeginKeyPanelFromKeyShortcut( )
05413 {
05414       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05415       INT16 sStartYPosition = 0;
05416       INT16 sWidth = 0, sHeight = 0;
05417 
05418       if ( gsCurInterfacePanel != SM_PANEL )
05419       {
05420             return;
05421       }
05422 
05423       if ( gpSMCurrentMerc == NULL )
05424       {
05425             return;
05426       }
05427 
05428       if ( gfInKeyRingPopup )
05429       {
05430             return;
05431       }
05432 
05433 
05434       sStartYPosition = INV_INTERFACE_START_Y;
05435       sWidth = SCREEN_WIDTH;
05436       sHeight = ( SCREEN_HEIGHT - ( INV_INTERFACE_START_Y ) );
05437       pSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
05438 
05439       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
05440       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05441             return;
05442 
05443       InitKeyRingPopup( pSoldier, 0, sStartYPosition, sWidth, sHeight ); 
05444 }
05445 
05446 
05447 void KeyRingItemPanelButtonCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05448 {
05449       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
05450       INT16 sStartYPosition = 0;
05451       INT16 sWidth = 0, sHeight = 0;
05452 
05453       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
05454       {
05455             if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
05456             {
05457                   return;
05458             }
05459 
05460             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE )
05461             {
05462                   return;
05463             }
05464 
05465             
05466             
05467 
05468             pSoldier = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] );
05469             sStartYPosition = MAP_START_KEYRING_Y;
05470             sWidth = 261;
05471             sHeight = ( 359 - 107 );
05472       }
05473       else
05474       {
05475             if ( gpSMCurrentMerc == NULL )
05476             {
05477                   return;
05478             }
05479 
05480             sStartYPosition = INV_INTERFACE_START_Y;
05481             sWidth = SCREEN_WIDTH;
05482             sHeight = ( SCREEN_HEIGHT - ( INV_INTERFACE_START_Y ) );
05483             pSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
05484       }
05485 
05486       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
05487       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05488             return;
05489 
05490       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
05491       {
05492             return;
05493       }
05494 
05495       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
05496       {
05497             if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
05498             {
05499                   // want the inv done button shutdown and the region behind the keyring shaded
05500                   //ForceButtonUnDirty( giMapInvDoneButton );
05501                   // shade the background
05502                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER , 0, 107, 261, 359 );
05503                   InvalidateRegion( 0, 107, 261, 359 );
05504             }
05505 
05506             InitKeyRingPopup( pSoldier, 0, sStartYPosition, sWidth, sHeight ); 
05507       }
05508 }
05509 
05510 void KeyRingSlotInvClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05511 {
05512       UINT32 uiKeyRing;
05513       // Copyies of values
05514       UINT16      usOldItemIndex;
05515       static BOOLEAN    fRightDown = FALSE;
05516       static BOOLEAN    fLeftDown = FALSE;
05517       INT32 iNumberOfKeysTaken = 0;
05518 
05519       uiKeyRing = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
05520 
05521       
05522       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
05523       {
05524             return;
05525       }
05526 
05527       //if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05528       //{
05529       //    fLeftDown = TRUE;
05530       //}
05531       //else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP && fLeftDown )
05532       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05533       {
05534             fLeftDown = FALSE;
05535 
05536             //if we are in the shop keeper interface
05537             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05538             {
05539                   INVENTORY_IN_SLOT InvSlot;
05540 
05541                   if( gMoveingItem.sItemIndex == 0 )
05542                   {
05543                         //Delete the contents of the item cursor
05544                         memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
05545                   }
05546                   else
05547                   {
05548                         memset( &InvSlot, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
05549 
05550                         // Return if empty
05551                         //if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
05552                         //    return;
05553 
05554 
05555                         // Fill out the inv slot for the item
05556                         //InvSlot.sItemIndex = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
05557 //                InvSlot.ubNumberOfItems = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].ubNumberOfObjects;
05558 //                InvSlot.ubItemQuality = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].bGunStatus;
05559                         //memcpy( &InvSlot.ItemObject, &gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05560                         //InvSlot.ubLocationOfObject = PLAYERS_INVENTORY;
05561 
05562                         //InvSlot.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile;
05563 
05564 
05565                         //Add the item to the Players Offer Area
05566                         //AddItemToPlayersOfferArea( gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, &InvSlot, (UINT8)uiHandPos );
05567 
05568                         // Dirty 
05569                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05570                   }
05571                   return;
05572             }
05573 
05574             // If we do not have an item in hand, start moving it
05575             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
05576             {
05577                   // Return if empty
05578                   if( ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubKeyID == INVALID_KEY_NUMBER ) || ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubNumber == 0 ) )
05579                         return;
05580 
05581                   // If our flags are set to do this, gofoit!
05582                   if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05583                   {
05584                   }
05585                   else
05586                   {
05587                         if ( gpItemPopupSoldier->ubID != gusSelectedSoldier )
05588                         {
05589                               SelectSoldier( gpItemPopupSoldier->ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
05590                         }
05591                   }
05592 
05593                   usOldItemIndex =  ( UINT16 )uiKeyRing ;
05594 
05595                   BeginKeyRingItemPointer( gpItemPopupSoldier, (UINT8)usOldItemIndex );
05596                   //BeginItemPointer( gpSMCurrentMerc, (UINT8)uiHandPos );
05597 
05598             }
05599             else
05600             {
05601                   UINT8             ubSrcID, ubDestID;
05602                   BOOLEAN           fOKToGo = FALSE;
05603                   BOOLEAN           fDeductPoints = FALSE;
05604 
05605                   if( ( gpItemPointer ->usItem < FIRST_KEY ) || ( gpItemPointer ->usItem > KEY_32 ) )
05606                   {
05607                         return;
05608                   }
05609 
05610                   // ATE: OK, get source, dest guy if different... check for and then charge appropriate APs
05611                   ubSrcID  = ( UINT8 )gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID;
05612                   if ( gpItemPointerSoldier )
05613                   {
05614                         ubDestID = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID;
05615                   }
05616                   else
05617                   {
05618                         ubDestID = ubSrcID;
05619                   }
05620 
05621                   if ( ubSrcID == ubDestID )
05622                   {
05623                         // We are doing this ourselve, continue
05624                         fOKToGo = TRUE;
05625                   } 
05626                   else
05627                   {
05628                         // These guys are different....
05629                         fDeductPoints = TRUE;
05630 
05631                         // First check points for src guy
05632                         if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05633                         {
05634                               if ( EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, 2, 0, TRUE ) )
05635                               {
05636                                     fOKToGo = TRUE;
05637                               }
05638                         }
05639                         else
05640                         {
05641                               fOKToGo = TRUE;
05642                         }
05643 
05644                         // Should we go on?
05645                         if ( fOKToGo )
05646                         {
05647                               if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05648                               {
05649                                     if ( EnoughPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc, 2, 0, TRUE ) )
05650                                     {
05651                                           fOKToGo = TRUE;
05652                                     }
05653                                     else
05654                                     {
05655                                           fOKToGo = FALSE;
05656                                     }
05657                               }
05658                         }
05659                   }
05660 
05661                   if ( fOKToGo )
05662                   {
05663                         //usOldItemIndex = gpSMCurrentMerc->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
05664                         //usNewItemIndex = gpItemPointer->usItem;
05665 
05666                         if ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubKeyID == INVALID_KEY_NUMBER || gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubKeyID == gpItemPointer->ubKeyID)
05667                         {
05668                               // Try to place here
05669                               if ( ( iNumberOfKeysTaken = AddKeysToSlot( gpItemPopupSoldier, ( INT8 )uiKeyRing, gpItemPointer ) ) )
05670                               {
05671                               
05672                                     if ( fDeductPoints )
05673                                     {
05674                                           // Deduct points
05675                                           if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05676                                           {
05677                                                 DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier,  2, 0 );
05678                                           }
05679                                           if ( gpItemPopupSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05680                                           {
05681                                                 DeductPoints( gpItemPopupSoldier,  2, 0 );
05682                                           }
05683                                     }
05684                                     
05685                                     // Dirty 
05686                                     fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05687 
05688                                     gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects -= ( UINT8 )iNumberOfKeysTaken;
05689 
05690                                     // Check if it's the same now!
05691                                     if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
05692                                     {
05693                                           if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
05694                                           {
05695                                                 MAPEndItemPointer();
05696                                           }
05697                                           else
05698                                           {
05699                                                 EndItemPointer();
05700                                           }
05701                                     }
05702 
05703                                     // Setup a timer....
05704                                     //guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
05705                                     //gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
05706                                     //gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = (INT8)uiHandPos;
05707 
05708                               }
05709                         }
05710                         else
05711                         {
05712                               // Swap!
05713                               SwapKeysToSlot( gpItemPopupSoldier, (INT8) uiKeyRing, gpItemPointer );
05714 
05715                               if ( fDeductPoints )
05716                               {
05717                                     // Deduct points
05718                                     if ( gpItemPointerSoldier && gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05719                                     {
05720                                           DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier,  2, 0 );
05721                                     }
05722                                     if ( gpSMCurrentMerc->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
05723                                     {
05724                                           DeductPoints( gpSMCurrentMerc,  2, 0 );
05725                                     }
05726                               }
05727                               
05728                               // Dirty 
05729                               fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05730 
05731                         }
05732                   }
05733             }
05734 
05735             UpdateItemHatches();
05736       }
05737       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
05738       {
05739             fRightDown = TRUE;
05740       }
05741       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP && fRightDown )
05742       {
05743             fRightDown = FALSE;
05744 
05745             // Return if empty
05746             if( ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubKeyID == INVALID_KEY_NUMBER ) || ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ uiKeyRing ].ubNumber == 0 ) )
05747             {
05748                   DeleteKeyRingPopup( );
05749                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05750                   return;
05751             }
05752             // Some global stuff here - for esc, etc
05753             // Check for # of slots in item
05754             if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
05755             {
05756                   if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
05757                   {
05758                         //InitKeyItemDescriptionBox( gpItemPopupSoldier, (UINT8)uiKeyRing, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_X, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0 );                 
05759       }
05760       else
05761       {
05762                         InitKeyItemDescriptionBox( gpItemPopupSoldier, (UINT8)uiKeyRing, SM_ITEMDESC_START_X, SM_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0 );               
05763       }
05764             }
05765       }
05766       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
05767       {
05768             fRightDown = FALSE;
05769             fLeftDown = FALSE;
05770       }
05771 
05772 }
05773

05776 void DisableSMPpanelButtonsWhenInShopKeeperInterface( BOOLEAN fDontDrawButtons )
05777 {
05778       //Go through the buttons that will be under the ShopKeepers ATM panel and disable them

05780       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
05781       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );
05782       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
05783       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
05784       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );
05785       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
05786       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] );
05787       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] );
05788 
05789       DisableButton( giSMStealthButton );
05790 
05791       //Make sure the options button is disabled
05792       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ OPTIONS_BUTTON ] );
05793 
05794       //Make sure the mapscreen button is disabled
05795       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
05796 
05797       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] );
05798       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] );
05799       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] );
05800       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] );
05801       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] );
05802       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] );
05803       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] );
05804       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] );
05805       DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] );
05806

05815

05817             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;

05819             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05820             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05821             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05822             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05823             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05824             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05825             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05826 
05827             ButtonList[ giSMStealthButton ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_DIRTY;
05828 
05829             //Make sure the options button is disabled
05830             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ OPTIONS_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_ENABLED;
05831 
05832             //Make sure the mapscreen button is disabled
05833             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_ENABLED;
05834 
05835             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05836             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ UPDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05837             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ CLIMB_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05838             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ STANCEDOWN_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05839             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ HANDCURSOR_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05840             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ BURSTMODE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05841             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ LOOK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05842             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ TALK_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05843             ButtonList[ iSMPanelButtons[ MUTE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05844 
05845             ButtonList[ giSMStealthButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_FORCE_UNDIRTY;
05846       }
05847 }
05848 
05849 
05850 BOOLEAN IsMouseInRegion( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion )
05851 {
05852       if ( (gusMouseXPos >= pRegion->RegionTopLeftX ) && (gusMouseXPos <= pRegion->RegionBottomRightX ) && (gusMouseYPos >= pRegion->RegionTopLeftY ) && (gusMouseYPos <= pRegion->RegionBottomRightY ) )
05853       {
05854             return( TRUE );
05855       }
05856       else
05857       {
05858             return( FALSE );
05859       }
05860 }
05861 
05862 
05863 void EnableButtonsForInItemBox( BOOLEAN fEnable )
05864 {
05865       if ( !fEnable )
05866       {
05867             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ NEXTMERC_BUTTON ] );
05868             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ PREVMERC_BUTTON ] );
05869             DisableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
05870       }
05871       else
05872       {
05873             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ NEXTMERC_BUTTON ] );
05874             EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ PREVMERC_BUTTON ] );
05875 
05876             if ( !gfDisableTacticalPanelButtons )
05877             {
05878                   EnableButton( iSMPanelButtons[ SM_MAP_SCREEN_BUTTON ] );
05879             }
05880       }
05881 }     
05882 
05883 
05884 void SMInvMoneyButtonCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05885 {
05886       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
05887       {
05888             return;
05889       }
05890       else if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05891       {
05892             //If the current merc is to far away, dont allow anything to be done
05893             if( gfSMDisableForItems )
05894                   return;
05895 
05896             //if the player has an item in his hand, 
05897             if( gpItemPointer != NULL )
05898             {
05899                   //and the item is money
05900                   if( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
05901                   {
05902                         CHAR16      zText[512];
05903                         CHAR16      zMoney[64];
05904 
05905         // Make sure we go back to movement mode...
05906                 guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
05907                 HandleTacticalUI( );
05908 
05909                         swprintf( zMoney, L"%d", gpItemPointer->uiMoneyAmount );
05910 
05911                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zMoney );
05912                         InsertDollarSignInToString( zMoney );
05913 
05914                         //ask the user if they are sure they want to deposit the money
05915                         swprintf( zText, gzMoneyWithdrawMessageText[ CONFIRMATION_TO_DEPOSIT_MONEY_TO_ACCOUNT ], zMoney );
05916 
05917                         if( guiCurrentScreen == SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN )
05918                         {
05919                               //if we are in the shop keeper interface, free the cursor
05920                               if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05921                               {
05922                                     FreeMouseCursor();
05923                               }
05924 
05925                               DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zText, SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmationToDepositMoneyToPlayersAccount, NULL );
05926                         }
05927                         else
05928                               DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zText, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmationToDepositMoneyToPlayersAccount, NULL );
05929                   }
05930             }
05931 
05932             //else bring up the money item description box to remove money from the players account
05933             else
05934             {
05935                   //set the flag indicating we are removing money from the players account
05936                   gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount = TRUE;
05937 
05938                   //create the temp object from the players account balance
05939 //                if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance > MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT )
05940 //                      CreateMoney( MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT, &gItemPointer );
05941 //                else
05942                         CreateMoney( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance, &gItemPointer );
05943 
05944                   InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( &gItemPointer, SM_ITEMDESC_START_X, SM_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0, gpSMCurrentMerc );
05945             }
05946       }
05947 }
05948 
05949 void ConfirmationToDepositMoneyToPlayersAccount( UINT8 ubExitValue )
05950 {
05951       if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
05952       {
05953             //add the money to the players account
05954             AddTransactionToPlayersBook( MERC_DEPOSITED_MONEY_TO_PLAYER_ACCOUNT, gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), gpItemPointer->uiMoneyAmount );
05955 
05956             // dirty shopkeeper
05957             gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
05958 
05959             EndItemPointer( );
05960       }
05961 }

05964 void ReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( )
05965 {
05966       gfReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons = TRUE;
05967 }
05968 
05969 void CheckForReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( )
05970 {
05971       // OK, if we currently have an item pointer up....
05972       if ( gfReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons )
05973       {
05974             if ( gpItemPointer || gfInItemPickupMenu )
05975             {
05976                   EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE, TRUE );
05977             }
05978             else
05979             {
05980                   EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE, TRUE );
05981             }
05982 
05983             gfReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons = FALSE;
05984       }
05985 }

05988 void AbandonBoxingCallback( UINT8 ubExitValue )
05989 {
05990       if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
05991       {
05992             // ok, proceed!
05993             SetBoxingState( NOT_BOXING );
05994             gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
05995       }
05996       // otherwise do nothing
05997 }
05998 
05999 void GoToMapScreenFromTactical( void )
06000 {
06001       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState != NOT_BOXING )
06002       {
06003             // pop up dialogue asking whether the player wants to abandon the fight
06004             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, Message[ STR_ABANDON_FIGHT ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, AbandonBoxingCallback, NULL );       
06005             return;
06006       }
06007       // ok, proceed!
06008       gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
06009 }
06010 
06011 
06012 void HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT32 uiInvPos, UINT16 usOldItem, UINT16 usNewItem )
06013 {
06014       // if in attached weapon mode and don't have weapon with GL attached in hand, reset weapon mode
06015       if ( (pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )&& !IsGrenadeLauncherAttached( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) ) )
06016       {
06017             if ( !Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].NoSemiAuto )
06018             {
06019                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
06020                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = FALSE;
06021                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;
06022             }
06023             else
06024             {
06025                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
06026                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = TRUE;
06027                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
06028             }
06029       }
06030 
06031       // if he is loaded tactically
06032       if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
06033       {
06034             // If this is our main hand
06035             if ( uiInvPos == HANDPOS || uiInvPos == SECONDHANDPOS )
06036             {
06037                   // check if we need to change animation!
06038                   ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( pSoldier, usOldItem, usNewItem );
06039             }
06040 
06041             // if this is head gear
06042             if ( uiInvPos == HEAD1POS || uiInvPos == HEAD2POS )
06043             {
06044                   // Could be because of GOGGLES change...  Re-create light...
06045                   DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
06046                   PositionSoldierLight( pSoldier );
06047             }
06048       }
06049       else
06050       {
06051             // as a minimum
06052             if ( (Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON) && GetShotsPerBurst(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]) == 0 )
06053             {
06054                   if ( !Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].NoSemiAuto )
06055                   {
06056                         pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
06057                         pSoldier->bDoBurst = FALSE;
06058                         pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;
06059                   }
06060                   else
06061                   {
06062                         pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
06063                         pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
06064                         pSoldier->bDoBurst = TRUE;
06065                   }
06066             }
06067       }
06068 }
